Mubeat Quiz Service Opened
- Mubeat quiz function has been added. Solve KPOP artist related quizzes. Obtain Heart Beats when you complete a quiz!
Other
- Bug fixes and minor services have been improved.
comments: It used to be the easiest voting app to watch ads from but the latest update is so frustrating. Why did they put 24-hour reset time? It's not everyday that we get free time during a certain hour. Say I've watched the first ad at 4pm today since I have a free time. Why do I have to wait until 4pm tomorrow to start watching ads again? I mean, it really lost its convenience. Please bring the reset time to 00:00 KST. It works well for everyone that way. Until then, I can only give one star.

I think this apps become worse after the latest update. I can't watch the ads even after 24 hours and the ads keeps unavailable. The worse is the notification said that I already reached my limit of watching ads when I did not even watch any. Please give back the old version since I did not have any problems with it before.

This is the most satisfying and smoothiest kpop based app I ever downloaded. It's actually my favorite kpop app like it's easy to watch ads and very easy to use. BUT! Please do something about video viewing here in the Philippines. I want to make the most of this app. Please do something about it... [EDIT: OCTOBER] Thank you very much for continuing the video viewing here in the Philippines! +üåü! And also the new update is truly the best! Thank you for always providing the best service possible

This is a great application before something went wrong, I can't watch my ads anymore, it's always says "There aren't ads available at this moment. Please try again later" even tho I didn't watch any ads today and the ads sign is still 0/15, please fix this problem, as soon as possible.

Normally I use the app while connected to WiFi but today I used data and when I opened the app all my account details were gone even my beats, I had to create another mubeat account which I did not like at all. The app worked great at first but now I don't know what is wrong with it. Please fix the app. (Edit: Thank you for responding, I have sent all the details you asked for and I hope my account will be retrieved soon )

title: AgroStar Kisan Helpline : Made in India
description:
What‚Äôs in the AgroStar Agri-Doctor App for Indian Kisan?
1. Krishi Charcha (‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ö‡§æ)
2. Weather Forecast for your farm (‡§Æ‡•å‡§∏‡§Æ)
3. Crop Info (‡§´‡§∏‡§≤ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä) (GJ, MH, RJ)
4. AgroStar Agri-Shop (‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•â‡§™‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó) (GJ, MH, RJ)

Why download the AgroStar Agri-Doctor App for farmers?
1. Biggest & most loved online farmer community in India
2. Available in 11 Regional languages: Hindi, Gujarati, Marathi, English. Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Kannada, Punjabi, Oriya and Bangla coming soon!!
3. Small size: 4.3 MB only
4. Works offline and in 2G & 3G: All app pages visited will be available in offline mode. The app is specially designed for rural India- very little internet data used!
5. Krishi Gyaan (‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•Ä ‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ‡§®): AgroStar‚Äôs ‚ÄòAgronomy Centre of Excellence‚Äô (ACE) is a team of expert agri-doctors who help farmers with farming advice, tips, and solutions. ACE has helped thousands of Indian farmers get better yield and better crop management. In AgroStar App‚Äôs ‚ÄòKrishi Gyaan‚Äô section, farmers get best agriculture tips & detailed crop growing knowledge not only created by ACE but also from expert sources like Agro-won, The Economic Times and several well-known external agriculture experts.
 
Features of the ‚ÄòAgroStar Agri-Doctor‚Äô App:

#1. Krishi Charcha (‡§ï‡§ø‡§∏‡§æ‡§® ‡§ö‡§∞‡•ç‡§ö‡§æ)
Farmers across India are now discussing their farming questions with AgroStar Agri-Doctor and fellow farmers! Farmers now post their agri problems with pictures, videos & text in their local languages. All farmers have now come together to help each other progress and win making AgroStar Agri-Doctor App the biggest and most loved online farmer group in India!
 
#2. Weather Forecast (‡§Æ‡•å‡§∏‡§Æ)
Farmers can get accurate weather information for today and the next 14 days for their exact village location. Weather updates include rainfall, temperature & humidity. In case of severe weather, farmers will also get alerts to help take preventive action & protect their crops. Brought to you in association with the world-renowned weather service provider- Accuweather.
 
#3. Crop Info (‡§´‡§∏‡§≤ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä) (GJ, MH, RJ)
Get expert information about 50+ crops including vegetables, horticulture, floriculture, fodder, cash, oilseed, spices, and pulses. Identify most crop diseases & crop nutrition issues and get to know their symptoms & how to solve them using products from more than 150+ quality agriculture brands like Bayer, DOW, Dhanuka, Indofil, Ajeet, MAHYCO, Rasi, Kisan Kraft, Pioneer, Monsanto, Ankur, Honda, TATA Rallis, Kaveri, UPL, Mahindra, John Deere, Kubota, VST, Lemken, Jain Irrigation, Rivulis, etc. Mandi prices for crops coming later in the application.
 
#4. Agriculture Shop (‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•â‡§™‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó)
Farmers can purchase all products needed for farming from the AgroStar Agri-Doctor App. Seeds, fungicides, weedicides, pesticides, bio and organic crop protection, crop nutrition products and farm implements like pumps, tractors, sprayers, tarpaulin sheets and mulching sheets are all now at the fingertips of farmers in this app.
 
Buddhimaan Aur Balwaan! Jai Kisan!

Farmers now post their agri problems with pictures, videos & text in their local languages. All farmers have now come together to help each other progress and win making AgroStar Agri-Doctor App the biggest and most loved online farmer group in India!

#2. Weather Forecast (‡§Æ‡•å‡§∏‡§Æ)
Farmers can get accurate weather information for today and the next 14 days for their exact village location. Weather updates include rainfall, temperature & humidity. In case of severe weather, farmers will also get alerts to help take preventive action & protect their crops. Brought to you in association with the world-renowned weather service provider- Accuweather.

#3. Crop Info (‡§´‡§∏‡§≤ ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä) (GJ, MH, RJ)
Get expert information about 50+ crops including vegetables, horticulture, floriculture, fodder, cash, oilseed, spices, and pulses. Identify most crop diseases & crop nutrition issues and get to know their symptoms & how to solve them using products from more than 150+ quality agriculture brands like Bayer, DOW, Dhanuka, Indofil, Ajeet, MAHYCO, Rasi, Kisan Kraft, Pioneer, Monsanto, Ankur, Honda, TATA Rallis, Kaveri, UPL, Mahindra, John Deere, Kubota, VST, Lemken, Jain Irrigation, Rivulis, etc. Mandi prices for crops coming later in the application.

#4. Agriculture Shop (‡§ï‡•É‡§∑‡•Ä ‡§∂‡•â‡§™‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó)
Farmers can purchase all products needed for farming from the AgroStar Agri-Doctor App. Seeds, fungicides, weedicides, pesticides, bio and organic crop protection, crop nutrition products and farm implements like pumps, tractors, sprayers, tarpaulin sheets and mulching sheets are all now at the fingertips of farmers in this app.

title: Surgery Master
description:
Perform operations like in real life and save lives in the most realistic surgery game! You are the courageous surgeon and take urgent care of your unlucky patients now!

The game is much more difficult than real surgery! Replace organs, repair bone fractures, and perform all kinds of operations with scalpel or forceps or laser. Can you rise to the challenge and become the real surgeon?

Game Features:
- Play doctor with hundreds of patients to cut open and operate on
- Operate on brains, hearts, lungs, legs, arms and then stitch wounds & clean blood
- Realistic hospital environments and authentic 3D surgery simulation
descriptionHTML:

summary: Perform operations like in real life in No.1 realistic surgery simulator game!
developerAddress: Osiris International Cayman Limited, Suite #4-210, Govemors Square, 23 Lime Tree Bay Avenue, PO Box 32311, Grand Cayman KY1-1209, Cayman Islands
recentChanges: v1.14: Fixed some minor issues of the game. Thanks.
comments: This game is great! Lots of levels, very realistic, if you are looking for a non addictive game this one is perfect for you. The only reason why I didn't put 5 stars is because there is an add after every level and sometimes even two. In all I do recommend this game but be aware of all the adds.

I will say it is good app for those who really want to become cardiologist. I am intrested in these types of activities. I will prefer all of you to use this app. I have given 4 stars only because this needs some changes to become more realistic. Otherwise, I have a fabulous experience. Thank you.

Its a really nice game ..... It has also help me because I wanted to become a nurse and I had a fear and now it seems like I am getting familiarized with this game and if there are any other person who are scared of doing this job it would make the job easier if they play this game thanks
The first sentence in the dialog has a typo. Decided to overlook it. It seems the dialog is very poor and controls aren't any better.

Nice game,great for medicine students helps u overcome ur fears but when u get to the level where u do it on your own, the energy bar decreases very fast once u cut the patient open and it runs down the phone battery fast and i think u can add more features like child birth surgeries but a good game anywayüëçüëçüëç

title: Tagalog Medical Phrases - Works offline
description:
Military-related phrases for language learners. With text and audio.

Using this app, you can select an English phrase and view its translation and how to pronounce it in the foreign language.

This app was originally developed as an entry to the 2010 CIO/G6 "Apps for the Army" competition, and it is based on the modules publicly available online from the U.S. Defense Language Institute. While this app's subject matter relates mainly to military topics, the app is broadly useful with content relating to a range of topics.

‚òÖ Easy to use
‚òÖ Native speaker audio
‚òÖ Dictionary lookup
‚òÖ Pronunciation help: Transliteration/Romanization text
‚òÖ Over 600 phrases
‚òÖ Voice-based lookup (speak the phrase you want in English)
‚òÖ Good for language learning, or as a reference
‚òÖ Free and unlimited

This is part of a series of phrasebook apps published for many different languages and dialects. Phrasebooks in the series are available as "basic" and "medical" variants.

‚òÖ Text may be exported as Anki flash cards
‚òÖ Works offline: No network connection is required
‚òÖ Search bar for quick vocabulary lookup
‚òÖ No login or registration needed
‚òÖ Dark background color minimizes eye strain

Many of the languages covered by this series of phrasebook apps are under-resourced, with translation apps and dictionaries not widely available from other sources.

*BASIC* phrasebooks contain the following categories of phrases:

Commands, Warnings and Instructions
Helpful Words, Phrases and Questions
Greetings and Introductions
Interrogation
Numbers
Days of the Week/Time
Directions
Locations
Descriptions (Colors, Shapes, Sizes, Tastes, Qualities, Quantities)
Emergency Terms
Food and Sanitation
Fuel and Maintenance
Medical Terms/General
Medical Terms/Parts of the Body
Military Ranks
Lodging
Occupations
Customs (Port of Entry)
Relatives
Weather
General Military Terms
Mine Warfare Terms

*MEDICAL* phrasebooks contain the following categories of phrases:

Introduction
Guidance
Registration
Assessment
Surgical Consent
Trauma
Procedures
Foley (Catheter)
Surgery Instructions
Pain Interview
Medicine Interview
Orthopedic
Obstetrics/Gynecology
Pediatrics
Cardiology
Ophthalmology
Neurology
Exam Commands
Caregiver
Post-Op/Prognosis
Medical Conditions
Pharmaceutical
Diseases

How to use

1. Choose a subject category from the menu. That category will be expanded.
2. From the expanded list of phrases shown, tap on the phrase you want.
3. On the phrase detail page, the phrase itself is shown alongside its pronunciation and the equivalent English phrase. Press the Play button to hear the audio pronunciation by a native speaker.

Ideal for

üåê U.S. Military service members
üåê Language learners
üåê Doctors, nurses, and medical staff
üåê Travelers
üåê Aid workers
üåê Linguists

Other languages and dialects available in this series

Albanian, Algerian, Amharic, Azeri, Baluchi, Bengali, Bosnian, Burmese, Cantonese, Cebuano, Chavacano, Croatian, Czech, Dari, Egyptian, Emirati, French, Gan (Jiangxinese), Georgian, Gujarati, Haitian, Hassaniya, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Igbo, Ilocano, Indonesian (Bahasa), Iraqi, Japanese, Javanese, Jordanian, Kashmiri, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean (North), Kosovar (Albanian), Kurmanji, Kyrgyz, Lebanese, Libyan, Lingala, Malay, Mandarin, Mongolian, Moroccan, Nepali, Palestinian, Pashto (Afgh.), Pashto (Pak.), Persian-Farsi, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Europe), Punjabi, Quechua, Russian, Saudi, Serbian, Sindhi, Somali, Sorani, Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Venezuela), Sudanese, Swahili, Syrian, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamashek, Tamil, Tausug, Telugu, Thai, Tigrinya, Tunisian, Turkish, Turkmen, Uighur, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Shanghainese, Yakan, Yemeni, Yoruba

title: Spanish-English English-Spanish Medical Dictionary
description:
With the rapid growth of the Spanish-speaking population globally, this comprehensive communicator has become a crucial resource for healthcare students and professionals. 

Download the FREE app and view selected topics 
- Approximately 10% of the content is viewable in the free app and tapping on the locked topic will launch the in-app purchase screen).

FULL DESCRIPTION:
With the rapid growth of the Spanish-speaking population globally, this comprehensive communicator has become a crucial resource for healthcare students and professionals. This latest update is based on the 4th edition with additional features, enhanced functionality and ongoing updates.

Spanish-English English-Spanish Medical Dictionary provides easy access to nearly 23,000 medical terms, technology-related medical terms, and medical abbreviations, plus definitions, translations, pronunciation, signs and symptoms, patient communication phrases, and much more. 

Key Features
- Updated and enhanced terminology, appendices, and illustrations
- Alphabetical organization makes locating terms quick and easy
- Color anatomical insert with labels in both English and Spanish
- Concise definitions with usage and translations for quick and easy reference
- Grammar sections provide a grammatical overview of both the English and Spanish languages
- Illustrations highlight key terms and concepts
- Spanish and English sections: all terms and definitions appear in both languages
- Valuable appendices including many key phrases and medical scenarios to help users better communicate with patients
- Consent, Authorization, and Release forms to obtain easier communication with patients when research projects or procedures are done
- Valuable Appendices include additional phrases focusing on HIV, AIDS, neonatology and bioterrorism
- Verb tables
- The content has been fully updated by adding new phrases ranging across the specialties of cardiology, immunology, neurology, oncology, ophthalmology, and neonatology - all fields noted for their new technical and procedural developments

Based on: 4th edition
Author: Onyria Herrera McElroy, Ph.D and Lola L. Grabb, M.A.
Publisher: Wolters Kluwer Health | Lippincott Williams & Wilkins
ISBN-13: 978-1608311293

SPECIAL FEATURES:
Locate a disease, symptom or medication in the fastest possible manner:
- Tap and Hold launch icon to open Last Topic, History, Favorites ..
- Navigate using multiple indices
- History to open frequently visited pages
- Bookmarks 

NEVER FORGET ANYTHING:
Mark topics with relevant information:
- Voice Notes
- Annotations with scribble, doodle or text
You choose the method to note this regardless of the context you are in to ensure that the important facts are available whenever you access the topic, whether it is tomorrow or six months from now.

title: Ruzzle Free
description:
- Top 10 word game in 145 countries
- Over 70 million players 
- So addictive, it has been played for a total of 100 000 years
- Now with Team Play!

Ruzzle is a fast-paced and addictively fun word game. Challenge your friends or random players to find as many words as possible in two minutes. 

Swipe over the scrambled letters to form the words and use bonus tiles to collect more points than your opponent. The game is played in three rounds, each played whenever suits you. 

Have two minutes to spare? Challenge yourself and your friends in Ruzzle! 

Ruzzle can be played in 14 languages.

--

Ruzzle has been lovingly created by MAG Interactive, where we take fun seriously.

Join a global audience of more than 100 million players and check out some of our other chart-topping hit games like WordBrain, Wordalot, or WordBrain 2!

We really value your feedback, go to https://www.facebook.com/ruzzlegame and say what's on your mind!

More about MAG Interactive at www.maginteractive.com

Good Times!

We really value your feedback, go to https://www.facebook.com/ruzzlegame and say what's on your mind!

More about MAG Interactive at www.maginteractive.com

Good Times!
summary: Join over 70 million players, try Ruzzle - the fastest word game!
developerAddress:
MAG Interactive
Drottninggatan 95A
113 60 Stockholm
Sweden
recentChanges:
- Bug fixes and improvements

Thanks for playing and for your continued feedback.

Let's Ruzzle!
comments: Very good game but they need to make some changes as it's gotten tedious & boring over the years. The store hasn't had anything new added to it for years; the team game doesnt reward players fairly relative to their input so there's no incentive to participate unless you intend to do little; the tournaments are fun to play but there's nothing in the store to acquire with the rewards anyway so why play. It'd be nice if they'd get creative with the store & add features like stakes for coins in 1v1

Really enjoy playing this game... Game improves speed of thinking, accuracy and concentration... Ads might be little bit annoying while playing, but it is worth it, since they are providing this game for free, with good and simple graphics. Frequency of ads reducing as we proceed to higher levels.
I like Ruzzle, but since the format for earning coins was changed, the game isn't as much fun. Doing surveys for coins is ittitati g, to say the least!!! The added games yield very few coins also.

It takes several mlnutes to get on. Once playing the game often stops and will not let me put any letters in. I do not have this prob!em with other games. I enjoy playing this game with a friend or would unsubscribe.

I usually don't write reviews. But I feel like have to this time. Even though it's a fun word game it's unfair when it comes to the competitions. It is not equal to all. You need coins for upgrades in the competitions. Some players can get 1000+ coins per day by pressing coin rewards and watching adds. While others have a limit to how many adds they can watch. I may only watch four adds per day, rewarding me with 60 coins. There seems to be no interest to solve the problem from the creators.

title: Galaxy Invaders: Alien Shooter -Free Shooting Game
description:
Galaxy Invaders: Alien Shooter -Free Shooting Game

In the far future, humanity has expanded and prosper over the galaxy. One day, a mysterious alien army from a different dimension appears and attacks the border planets. The fight for mankind survival begins. The first time since WWII (World War II - 1945), the Earth and Humankind have to face the danger of extinction. As a veteran spaceship striker pilot, you have been called to defend the galaxy against invader enemies, and become one of the guardians of the galaxy.

Galaxy Invaders: Alien Shooter -Free Shooting Game is a combination of classic shoot ‚Äòem up game feels and modernized mechanics. Some key features:

- A BROAD RANGE OF ENEMIES: From the lowly common soldier aliens, to the powerful Elites, and the humongous Bosses. Each has different looks and behaviors.
- MULTIPLE MODES: experience the mounting difficulty with unique challenges on the way. Continuously updated with new contents. Now there are CAMPAIGN, ENDLESS & HARD MODE. PvP mode is coming soon!
- UPGRADE & EVOLVE your spaceship to new form and gain new power & skills 
- WIDE ARRAY OF SPACESHIPS AND DRONES to collect, each with unique skill and playstyle. Unlock LEGENDARY space shooter ships to get super power in your aircraft collection.
- MANY SEASONAL EVENTS with special unique rewards. Build your galaxy guardian squad to be strong and marvelous.

Choose your infinite shooting spaceship, fly on the wings, surf on the winds, strike through the dunes, soar into the clouds, fling on the stars, destroy the alien invaders and protect the galaxy. Let's show them what you‚Äôre capable of!

As an extended version of Galaxy Attack: Alien Shooter, this version has a new modern fantasy graphic design. We also changed something in core game mechanics like weapon skills, item skill, pilot skills, ship part & evolution types. With various types of spaceship, you could build a strong air force and join the galaxy shooting wars. The old style of shoot ‚Äòem up game is now modernized with a fantasy theme. We keep using retro shooting game mechanics like level with waves, bullet hell bosses but added more interesting content. You can see the same feeling like Galaxy Attack: Alien Shooter as the other retro free shooting games. But, this game is a brand new one. Let‚Äôs try and enjoy it - Galaxy Invader: Alien Shooter -Free Shooting Game!

We has created a FB group for you to discuss about this game, you could join in the link below:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/261903527847165/

Welcome to Galaxy Invader: Alien Shooter -Free Shooting Game. Build your strong guardian air force galaxy squad, and enjoy the game!

Thank you for playing our game!

comments: UGGGHHH!!! I've been playing this for a while now and I had tons of ship parts and money and after I went and updated I lost everything I worked so hard for. I hope that glitch gets fixed. But overall I love this game but it should be easier to upgrade your ship. Thanks

I have never quit a game the same day i started it, until now. And odds are more money is made by the ads than the players. I was excited when i started playing too many bugs and bad choices by the devs or management however.

Predatory gambling and political ads ruin what could have been a fun experience. Edit - Cookie cutter reply from Devs fails to address my concerns. Gameplay is good, predatory ads for malware or gambling are not.

Beginnings are fun, but later it's unplayable for free users. Too many ads, repetitive, unjust, unfair. At some point, progressing is limited to paying customers, upgrading your ships above certain levels is available only after buying crystals or cards. You don't receive enough of them during normal game. Ads can break the sound in the game, and pause your music. Free users are limited to 20 games at a time. Then you need to wait for energy to replenish.

I updated the app to this latest version and lost all my ship and drone upgrades!!! That sucked biiiiiiiig time and deserved 1/5. üåü But the compensation received in the in-app mail was more than enough and deserves a 5-star rating...have your 5/5 üåü as a sign of gratitude from yours truly.

title: Wattpad - Read & Write Stories
description:
Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of 90 million readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over fifty languages from writers around the world! Whatever you‚Äôre into reading‚Äîromance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction‚Äîit‚Äôs all on Wattpad. So whether you‚Äôre looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you‚Äôll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you‚Äôre reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you‚Äôre on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you‚Äôve seen The Kissing Booth on Netflix, streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd‚Äôs series After, you may not know‚Äîthese stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow‚Äôs box-office sensation today.



Already a Wattpad fan? Follow us on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter to stay up-to-date on your favorite writers, stories, contests, and more!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wattpad/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wattpad/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wattpad

comments: I LOVE THIS APP. I've had it for about 2 years now and it works perfectly. The updates are working and I don't experience any glitches and problems. All my favourite books are written on the app and getting to know the writers and the rest of the Wattpaders is really awesome and fun. I can write my chapters properly, only problem is, I'm worried it does not save or publish properly as it gives me false information and can be confusing. But nonetheless, great reading app!! Highly recommended.

Helloooo. I'm writing this to say that I like the previous version of wattpad. When I open the app, it doesn't take long for the stories to appear. Now, I still need to open the internet to see my library which is a bit of a hassle. If I may recommend, please return the previous versions. The one without the need to download offline stories, because seriously, I don't like the update. I've been on wattpad since 2011 and so far, this is the worse update for me.

The app itself is good but lately, i have been experiencing a lot of events such as one time I was writing a story that was worth about 600+ words but then a warning popped up saying "wattpad has suddenly stopped" which as you may know, all of the things i written wasn't saved. It broke my heart because I've been wanting to finish i but I have to restart and write it again. I hope that you can fix this. If so maybe the problem is my device.

I'm using wattpad since 2014. Every year I saw how it changed. I'm missing the old wattpad when there is no Ads (every chapter), you can read different stories without paying for it, and you can add many stories in your library. Idk, what are the creators are thinking, lol. I just hope that the next update will get more better (lessen the ads and remove the limit of stories you can add in your library for offline reading)

I totally want the Old Wattpad back. Everything is far different of what I used to love about this app. I've been using this app for almost 10 years and I know that the creator wants to improve it and earned money from it but this is too much. I have been experiencing some moments when I can't read because I need to connect to Internet but I'm already connected and that confuse me...

title: Flora Incognita - automated plant identification
description:
The Flora Incognita App enables you to identify plants automatically quickly, easily and accurately .

The identification process is intuitive: take a  picture of the flower and the leaf with camera of your smartphone. The unknown plant is then identified automatically within seconds. In addition to the specific plant species name, a species profile page presents further information such as characteristics, distribution or protection status of the species. You can also save, export or share your plant observations on different social media channels.

On repeated occasions we would like to point out that the app is suitable for the identification of wild plants . We do NOT support the numerous breeding and crossing of garden and indoor plants ! 


The app contains: 

- automatic identification of 4800+ plant species of the European wild flora 
- species portraits for each species with information on appearance, toxicity, protection status, distribution
- more than 10.000 pictures of the European flora 
- a species list with all species
- search and filter function for fast finding of a species
- creation of observation lists
- export function of observations

Comments:

- We cannot include ornamental and indoor plants in the determination at 
the present time.


The Flora Incognita app goes beyond a pure destination app. Under the menu item "News" you will always find news and various join-in activities. 

Do you have any questions? Then take a look at our FAQs on our website.

Why location inquiry? The aim of the Flora Incognita project is also plant mapping. This is only possible if we have a location for the recorded plants. You can find further information on our website. 


Use with account or without account? You do not need to log in to use the Flora Incognita app to identify plants. If you do not want to create a profile, tap "Use without account" on the login page. To create a profile, all you need to do is enter an email address and password. All your recorded plant observations will be saved under this profile. This allows you to log in to the Flora Incognita App on a different or a new device, and you will also have your entire plant collection. You can find detailed information here on our website. 

The Flora Incognita apps are a common effort of the Technical University
Ilmenau and the Max Planck Institute for Biogeochemistry Jena. Their
development was funded by the Federal Ministry of Education and
Research, the Federal Agency for Nature Conservation with funds from the
Federal Ministry for the Environment, Nature Conservation and Nuclear
Safety as well as the Thuringian Ministry for Environment, Energy and
Nature Conservation and the Thuringia Nature Conservation Foundation.
The project was recognized as an official project of the "UN Decade of
Biodiversity".

Follow us:

Webseite: www.floraincognita.com
Facebook: https://de-de.facebook.com/Flora.Incognita/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/flora_incognita?lang=de

comments: Excellent app, quick and accurate. One issue noted with species profile pages - image zoom has aspect ratio issues. Image is stretched horizontally or vertically, depending on screen orientation, when an image is zoomed.
It's a very accurate app to identify flowers, trees and bushes on our homestead. I love the detailed information and uses. Enjoying this free app very much!
Mostly accurate, a little more cumbersome to use than paid apps, but it's free, so it's great.

Excellent little app that is useful on my walks and hike to identify a variety of flowers, shrubs, trees, etc. Works really well as Camera setting works well and has an option to retake the photo.a plant identifier.
Really great app. Not a 100% detection rate but still really good.

title: DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE
description:
DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE is the one of the best DRAGON BALL mobile game experiences available. This DB anime action puzzle game features beautiful 2D illustrated visuals and animations set in a DRAGON BALL world where the timeline has been thrown into chaos, where DB characters from the past and present come face to face in new and exciting battles! Experience the new story and save the world of DRAGON BALL!

DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE features a super refreshing and simplistic approach to the anime action genre! The epic anime-like battles feature simple yet addictive gameplay. Link Ki spheres during battle to attack your foes! Take your time and play at your own pace, it‚Äôs the perfect DB game to play on the go wherever you are! When you are ready and powered up, finish your enemies with powerful Super Attacks such as Super Saiyan Goku‚Äôs Kamehameha and many more to send enemies flying!

All of your favorite characters are here from all your favorite DRAGON BALL anime series! From DBZ to DBS, everyone‚Äôs favorite Saiyan, Goku and his friends are ready to battle Frieza, Cell, Beerus, Jiren, and more! Summon your favorite DB characters and create the ultimate dream team(s)! Train and Awaken DB characters to power them up!

Help return order to the DRAGON BALL timeline through Quest mode. Experience reimagined popular anime stories with DB characters new and old. Play in Dokkan Events and the World Tournament and face off against tough enemies! And for true hardened fighters, the challenges of Extreme Z-Battle and Super Battle Road await!

SIMPLE ADDICTING GAMEPLAY
‚Ä¢ Featuring a new take on the action puzzle game genre
‚Ä¢ Tap and link Ki Spheres to attack and enter Dokkan Mode to finish foes!!
‚Ä¢ Play at your own pace, planning your battle strategy is key

FINISH FOES WITH SUPER ATTACKS
‚Ä¢ Collect enough Ki Spheres to activate Super Attacks just like the anime
‚Ä¢ From Goku‚Äôs Iconic Kamehameha attack to Vegeta‚Äôs Final Flash, all your favorites are here
‚Ä¢ Experience them all in epic 2D illustrations and animations

YOUR FAVORITE DRAGON BALL CHARACTERS ARE HERE
‚Ä¢ From DBZ to DBS, many popular DB characters are available
‚Ä¢ Summon new and classic favorites such as Super - Saiyan God SS Goku, Vegeta, Krillin or rivals such as Frieza, Cell, Beerus, and Jiren plus more from the popular anime series

FORM YOUR TEAM OF POWERFUL WARRIORS
‚Ä¢ Organize your DRAGON BALL team and create the strongest fighting force!
‚Ä¢ Train your favorite DB characters and Awaken them to new realms of power!

A NEW DRAGON BALL STORY
‚Ä¢ Bring order to the DRAGON BALL timeline
‚Ä¢ Play the board game-style map and all-new story with your favorite Dragon Ball characters!
‚Ä¢ Experience reimagined stories with DB characters new and old

Are you ready to go even further beyond? Download one of the best DRAGON BALL experiences available with DRAGON BALL Z DOKKAN BATTLE today for free!

SUPPORT:
https://bnfaq.channel.or.jp/contact/faq_list/1624

BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment Inc. Website:
https://bandainamcoent.co.jp/english/

By downloading or installing this app, you agree to the BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment Terms of Service.

Terms of Service:

This game contains some items available for in-app purchase that can enhance gameplay and speed up your progress. In-app purchases can be disabled in your device settings, see

4.11.2

comments: This game is really really big. Many characters. Cannon and not cannon. Lots of events and free things. Amazing characters. It makes you think. Team building and a lot of fun. Only compliant is that they're things that it doesn't tell you. So you either have to look it up or learn it. Other than that it is an amazing game and if you like DragonBall I recommend it. The animation has progressed so thats something to take into consideration. If 2d is your thing definite 5*

Great game and fun to play. There is a lot of potential but a few things I wish were a bit different. Drop rates for good units make it P2W friendly, but you can play completely free. There is an energy meter that I don't care for but hasn't been too hindering. If you're a fan of Dragon Ball, check it out! 4/5 only because of low drop rates on a PvE game

Incredible game, the animations are incredible, the artwork the detail put in the game is what has made this game my favorite game I have ever played on mobile. There is nothing that you need to add to it. Just maybe make the chances of getting an LR on a legendary banner a bit more, bc I wasted more than 1000 stones and didn't end up getting the LR I wanted. Other than that, the game is 100% without a doubt the best mobile game I ever played

Genuinely one of, if not the, best mobile game. The gameplay is fun, the animation is slick, and the rates are just right. Alot of gacha games have very low or high rates, low rates cause resentment to the summons, while high rates make your accomplishments feel worthless. The characters and skills are cool, but you have to work for it. I haven't spent a dime on this game and yet I still have good units because I worked hard for them. If you haven't, play this game, you will not regret it.

I've played dokkan since it came out, been through the ups and downs of it all. Played the jp version as well, and the major issue to me is that the content is just lacking. There's nothing really beyond getting the new unit and maxing it. Once you've gotten a huge box and filled out your team's it's just log in for dailys and save stones for new unit. Please dokkan, get some content in this game. I beg you. Beyond that Dragonball keeps me hype enough to keep losing storage space to it.

title: Messenger for SMS
description:
Messages - the best custom Messages & call app with countless themes, fonts, wallpapers, ringtones, call features and everything you want. Fully customizable by you!  Send 3000+ new emojis, funny faces, stickers, GIFs &text messages via SMS messages. Sending funny SMS messages. Sending picture, audio, video MMS messages to share the amazing moment. Sending GIFs and emoji messages to express yourself better. A funny SMS messages app to replace stock messages app!

Messages ‚Äì Text and Send messages safely with private box, SMS blocker, even SMS backup & restore and schedule SMS! Won‚Äôt worry about losing private messages,  missing big moments, and won‚Äôt worry about spam messages waste phone storage by blocking text messages. Texting SMS messages has never been so great with countless emoji, GIF, sticker, theme, private box, SMS blocker, SMS backup & restore and schedule SMS! Enjoy sending & blocking text messages with funny SMS messages.

Messages Key Features

-BACKUP & RESTORE
‚úî Backup SMS & MMS messages to cloud, messages never get lost
‚úî Restore deleted or lost SMS & MMS message whenever

- Caller ID
‚úî Identify numbers in real time - even those not in your contact list
‚úî Get warnings for more than 1 million spam numbers worldwide

- Connect calls with Messages
‚úî One click text a contact after each call. No need to input number again
‚úî Access other Messages features directly from caller ID screen

- SCHEDULE SMS
‚úî Delayed SMS message give opportunity to correct the wrong message
‚úî Never miss any big moment with schedule SMS Messages

- PRIVATE BOX
‚úî Encrypt messages or contacts & lock down with private box
‚úî Hide private box icon to protect privacy from being snooped

- SMS BLOCKER
‚úî No worry about spam messages consume storage space with blocker
‚úî Block text messages via adding to SMS blocker

- FREE FUNNY SMS COLLECTION
‚úî10+ categories SMS messages you can choose
‚úî Text with Love, flirt, romantic SMS, friendship SMS and more

- FUNNY EMOJI MESSAGE
‚úî Fast text 3000+ funny face, emoji & emoticons from messages directly
‚úî Great display of funny face, emoji & emoticons in text message

- FUNNY EMOJI STYLE IN Messages
‚úî Messages support all new funny emoji & funny face in SMS
‚úî Support update multiple emoji in SMS
‚úî Support Unicorn, Middle Finger, Taco Rainbow and more funny emoji

- FREE ANIMATED GIF & EMOJI ART
‚úî Share thousands of trending hot GIFs MMS via MMS
‚úî Share unique Emoji Art & funny face with friends via SMS

- CUSTOMIZE SMS THEMES
‚úî Tons of amazing messaging themes
‚úî Customize SMS background as you wish

- AWESOME MESSAGES CUSTOMIZATION
‚úî Customize texting bubble, SMS bubble, color, font & wallpaper
‚úî Take photo as wallpaper or choose wallpaper from photo gallery

- DRIVING MODE & AUTO REPLY
‚úî Driving Mode disable message notifications from messages or stock messages except phone call
‚úî Auto Reply when Driving Mode is turned on, keep distractions to a minimum

- ANDROID WEAR COMPATIBLE
‚úî SMS Messages works perfectly on Android Wear
‚úî Get wear SMS Messages on your android wear

- MORE FEATURES
‚úî Send picture, audio, video MMS messages to more than one friends for once time
‚úî Clipboard for multiple fast copy and paste text messages
‚úî Pop up new message for a quick view and quick reply
‚úî Quick search to find exactly what you are looking for in free text messages

‚ù§Contact Us
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MessagesSMS
Email: smsmessagesfeedback@gmail.com
We are constantly working hard on making the ‚ÄúMessages‚Äù more perfect for your SMS & MMS Texting needs. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or just say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of ‚ÄòMessages‚Äô.Tell your friends if you are enjoying free funny SMS & MMS Messages.

Thanks for your support

title: Microchepaly Disease
description: Microcephaly is a medical condition in which the brain does not develop properly resulting in a smaller than normal head. Microcephaly may be present at birth or it may develop in the first few years of life. Often people with the disorder have an intellectual disability, poor motor function, poor speech, abnormal facial features, seizures, and dwarfism. The disorder may stem from a wide variety of conditions that cause abnormal growth of the brain, or from syndromes associated with chromosomal abnormalities. A homozygous mutation in one of the microcephalin genes causes primary microcephaly. It serves as an important neurological indication or warning sign, but no uniformity exists in its definition. It is usually defined as a head circumference (HC) more than two standard deviations below the mean for age and sex. Some academics advocate defining it as head circumference more than three standard deviations below the mean for the age and sex.

title: Dictionary - Merriam-Webster
description:
Get America‚Äôs most useful and respected dictionary, optimized for your Android device. This is the best Android app for English language reference, education, and vocabulary building.

And now we‚Äôve added new word games! It‚Äôs never been more fun to learn new words and test your vocabulary for everyone from English learners to total word nerds. Hundreds of words to test your skills.

The app is free, and supported by ads.

No internet connection is required to view the definitions or thesaurus (although you do need a connection to view illustrations, hear audio pronunciations, and use voice search).

* Voice Search: look up a word without having to spell it

comments: thanks a lot for the free offline quality dictionary. The thesaurus has been far better and wider. So bad to see the learner's definitions are gone, but ok. The biggest matter with me on new version is that the ''tap to open'' function on words which has always been an awesome feature; has been extremely sensitive on touch and opens the words in a very extraordinary way and keeps distracting and bothering me all the time, the way I'm afraid touching the screen. It would be great if you fix this.

Ive been loving this application coz it helps me alot on improving my vocabulary but now I don't know what happened üòî. Everytime I searched for a word it would say, "sorry, not enough storage space. Please free up some space and retry" though I still had enough space. I hope you'll fix this.

Poor user interface: It requires three taps before you're able to start entering a word to look up (which surely must be the primary use case by far). It has no fuzzy lookup (e.g.. soundex). If you don't know how the word is spelled, you can't look it up.

The free version of the free dictionary blows premium paid MW out of the water. I have premium mw and thesaurus and just purchased the premium version of the free dictionary. There is no comparison. Its not just my preference, TFD is demonstrably superior.
It was so helpful for like me, who has a hobby of doing poems. I really enjoyed searching different words to fit to a certain topic of my work. So far there is no any trouble.

description:
Choose your favorite hero character to play with, and journey across the moonlit rooftops and through the night, collecting as many orbs as you can. But beware of those pesky villains, they‚Äôre up to mischief again! 

The PJ Masks are on their way, into the night to save the day!

FEATURES 
‚Ä¢ The app has 21 levels that are free to play, and additional content can be bought via the Shop in the app. 
‚Ä¢ Collectable orbs - collect orbs to add to your final score. 
‚Ä¢ Gold amulets - pick up gold amulets along the way to boost your final score. Make sure you keep your eyes out for them because they‚Äôre hard to find! 
‚Ä¢ Hazards - dodge the obstacles the villains are throwing in their way! 

CHARACTER POWERUPS 
Collect the colored amulets and trigger the heroes‚Äô superpowers: 
‚Ä¢ Catboy ‚Äì ability to jump higher

‚Ä¢ Gekko ‚Äì ability to smash through obstacles

comments: Good, search mode is not working

Goofyl app. Unituitive and diifficult to navigate. We have 1 iPhone and 1 Android but we don't see the same app controls. We bought guided tours from the local Denver provider but the codes don't really work with the app.: we. can't download the audio and now we have the same touur twice. Pick the wrong one and you will be charged again

Used this program to post up our QCT Miami Daily City Tour and QCT Miami Black Heritage Tour in several segments. Once I watched the tutorials and worked with it over a period of time it became easier and easier to publish my tours, make changes/updates, and even add multiple languages and various voices to narrate.

Overall experience is good. Two things I need to mention: 1) when you download your, sometimes it download previous one instead of downloading which I'm currently observing. 2) when it plays content bright pixel start blinking on top of the screen. Why?

Time consuming with limited content. May be a glitch but when I search I get several tours not available in english even though default language is set to english. Abit of time wasted when tour names are the site name.

title: Expedia Hotels, Flights & Car Rental Travel Deals
description:
Exclusive savings on hotels, flights, cars, and travel for the ultimate travel experience. 
Book your hotels, flights, rental cars, things to do and bundle deals on the app and get Double Expedia Rewards points! Over 500,000+ hotels worldwide  including some of the best hotels in the US, including boutique hotels, luxury hotels, airport hotels, hostels, B&Bs and resorts. Free cancellation on most hotels. Because flexibility matters.

From planning to booking, the Expedia App is designed to enhance your travel and hence acknowledged as Webby for People's Voice: Best Travel App. Save with mobile-exclusive hotel deals and stay one step ahead with flight, hotel and car alerts and view your trip details anytime, anywhere.

Save big when booking bundle deals:
- Select your perfect hotel and ideal flight 
- Keep an eye out for Unreal Deals
- View your flight and hotel details together and marvel at all you‚Äôve saved 

Save big on hotel rooms:
- Save up to 25% with mobile-exclusive hotel deals for tonight, or any night
- Sort by price, free cancellation, deals or reviews to find a hotel perfect for you
- Read real reviews from verified hotel guests

Find your perfect flight:
- Choose from hundreds of airlines
- Sort by price, no change fees flights, duration or departure and arrival time
- Book all class types, from economy to first class seats

Get going as soon as you land:
- Enjoy round-trip car rentals from any airport ‚Äì with no cancellation fee
- Reserve a car rental up to 30 minutes in advance
- Choose from our selection of standard car rentals, luxury autos, SUVs and more

Discover and book things to do:
- Browse and book activities for hundreds of destinations worldwide 
- Get tickets for tours, shows and theme parks, museums and more 
- Reserve airport shuttles and ground transportation

Book in a flash and get rewarded for your travel:
- Already signed in? Complete your booking in less than 30 seconds
- Earn double Expedia Rewards points on all your purchases

Your trip companion, no matter the device: 
- View upcoming trip details, hotel address information and get maps for directions 
- Receive alerts for flight delays, hotel check-out times and more
- Share itineraries with family and friends via email or text message
- Get inspired with our curated tablet travel collections

Download the Expedia App for hotels, flights, cars rentals, activities and bundle deals today! 

*Limited quantity, while supplies last. Terms and conditions apply. Only available for customers residing in the US.

*Savings based on all vacation package bookings with Flight + Hotel on Expedia.com from September 2013 through February 2014, as compared to price of the same components booked separately. Savings will vary based on origin/destination, length of trip, stay dates and selected travel supplier(s). Savings not available on all packages.

The Expedia app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By using our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies.

comments: As others have said, the app is currently broken. You can only sign in after you reset your password, and even if you do, the app fails to load upcoming trips. Other things are customer unfriendly. For example, if I want to cancel a trip, you now have to chat with a bot (versus just being able to do a simple "click-and-cancel" request). I understand that it may help Expedia's contact deflection measures, but it feels needlessly complicated.

As of October 2020, the app has gotten much worse. Don't bother with it. Original comments: Works, but limited. You get a lot more choices on the webpage than you do in the app; so shopping for travel is mediocre. However, great to have your itineraries on the app. It would be nice if it stored full itineraries locally in case no connection.

Was a pretty good app. Now will not show trips after you book them.. dates change between starting seach and booking. Have had several booking only to show up to hotel or car rental place to find out my booking dates are wrong sometimes days weeks and even months away from the dates I chose. Expedia points not worth the hassles of miss placed bookings maybe time to use a new service if they don't fix this soon!!! Ridiculous that these bugs lasted more then a few days....

The app is very broken. When I open it I am greeted to a screen that is flashing and not responsive. When I go to close the app it opens back up and I have to fight with it. It was a good app before all this mess. Best part is my trip is in 3 days and I'm stuck using the browser on my cell phone. Just fix it.

I rated this app earlier 5 star because it used to work really smooth. Now whenever I try to log in, it makes me do the image authentication plus makes me log in again. I liked it when it was simple and kept me logged on. I want to give it 5 star, so please help me with this so I can update this rating.

title: Mandarin Medical Phrases - Works offline
description:
Military-related phrases for language learners. With text and audio.

Using this app, you can select an English phrase and view its translation and how to pronounce it in the foreign language.

This app was originally developed as an entry to the 2010 CIO/G6 "Apps for the Army" competition, and it is based on the modules publicly available online from the U.S. Defense Language Institute. While this app's subject matter relates mainly to military topics, the app is broadly useful with content relating to a range of topics.

‚òÖ Easy to use
‚òÖ Native speaker audio
‚òÖ Dictionary lookup
‚òÖ Pronunciation help: Transliteration/Romanization text
‚òÖ Over 600 phrases
‚òÖ Voice-based lookup (speak the phrase you want in English)
‚òÖ Good for language learning, or as a reference
‚òÖ Free and unlimited

This is part of a series of phrasebook apps published for many different languages and dialects. Phrasebooks in the series are available as "basic" and "medical" variants.

‚òÖ Text may be exported as Anki flash cards
‚òÖ Works offline: No network connection is required
‚òÖ Search bar for quick vocabulary lookup
‚òÖ No login or registration needed
‚òÖ Dark background color minimizes eye strain

Many of the languages covered by this series of phrasebook apps are under-resourced, with translation apps and dictionaries not widely available from other sources.

*BASIC* phrasebooks contain the following categories of phrases:

Commands, Warnings and Instructions
Helpful Words, Phrases and Questions
Greetings and Introductions
Interrogation
Numbers
Days of the Week/Time
Directions
Locations
Descriptions (Colors, Shapes, Sizes, Tastes, Qualities, Quantities)
Emergency Terms
Food and Sanitation
Fuel and Maintenance
Medical Terms/General
Medical Terms/Parts of the Body
Military Ranks
Lodging
Occupations
Customs (Port of Entry)
Relatives
Weather
General Military Terms
Mine Warfare Terms

*MEDICAL* phrasebooks contain the following categories of phrases:

Introduction
Guidance
Registration
Assessment
Surgical Consent
Trauma
Procedures
Foley (Catheter)
Surgery Instructions
Pain Interview
Medicine Interview
Orthopedic
Obstetrics/Gynecology
Pediatrics
Cardiology
Ophthalmology
Neurology
Exam Commands
Caregiver
Post-Op/Prognosis
Medical Conditions
Pharmaceutical
Diseases

How to use

1. Choose a subject category from the menu. That category will be expanded.
2. From the expanded list of phrases shown, tap on the phrase you want.
3. On the phrase detail page, the phrase itself is shown alongside its pronunciation and the equivalent English phrase. Press the Play button to hear the audio pronunciation by a native speaker.

Ideal for

üåê U.S. Military service members
üåê Language learners
üåê Doctors, nurses, and medical staff
üåê Travelers
üåê Aid workers
üåê Linguists

Other languages and dialects available in this series

Albanian, Algerian, Amharic, Azeri, Baluchi, Bengali, Bosnian, Burmese, Cantonese, Cebuano, Chavacano, Croatian, Czech, Dari, Egyptian, Emirati, French, Gan (Jiangxinese), Georgian, Gujarati, Haitian, Hassaniya, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Igbo, Ilocano, Indonesian (Bahasa), Iraqi, Japanese, Javanese, Jordanian, Kashmiri, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean (North), Kosovar (Albanian), Kurmanji, Kyrgyz, Lebanese, Libyan, Lingala, Malay, Mandarin, Mongolian, Moroccan, Nepali, Palestinian, Pashto (Afgh.), Pashto (Pak.), Persian-Farsi, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Europe), Punjabi, Quechua, Russian, Saudi, Serbian, Sindhi, Somali, Sorani, Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Venezuela), Sudanese, Swahili, Syrian, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamashek, Tamil, Tausug, Telugu, Thai, Tigrinya, Tunisian, Turkish, Turkmen, Uighur, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Shanghainese, Yakan, Yemeni, Yoruba

Making flash cards: Launch app and choose "Flash cards" from the menu in the top corner, and follow the prompts.

comments: Very useful! It would be nice if it used a standard romanization like pinyin or Wade-Giles. Also it would be nice if there were tone markings on the romanization.

This is great for somebody who has basic knowledge of Mandarin, but would like to learn more medical and technical terminology. The only problem is in the "medical interview" section. In that category all of the spoken translations are messed up and 1 off (so it is translating for the phrase before it). Otherwise would have given 5 stars.
The romanization of syllables isn't standard pinyin so it can be a bit weird at first and some sounds don't match upbut this is a good source overall.
Thanks...
Ambot sa kandinga may bangs

title: Real Steel World Robot Boxing
description:
Join Atom, Zeus, Noisy Boy, and many more of your favorite Robots in the battle for supremacy of the Real Steel universe. This exciting action-fighting Robot Boxing and Brawler brings the heroic storytelling and spectacular action from over 100 years of Robot Fighting on to your mobile device! Top the Leaderboards, claim the Championship title and reign supreme as the Ultimate World Robot Boxing Champion. Win big in Versus Leagues & Global Tournaments. 

Achieve greatness in the future of boxing, where gigantic robots pack powerful punches. Unleash your fighting style with Deadly jabs, Uppercuts & Special moves to win world championship belts, collect trophies & knockout friends!

UNLEASH ROBOT TITANS 
Towering over 9 feet tall and weighing over 2000 pounds are your 58 ultimate fighting machines, robot titans & legends including fan favorite superstars ‚Äì Zeus, Atom, Noisy boy & Twin Cities.

BRAWL WITH REAL-TIME WITH FRIENDS 
Unleash your true self in live local Wi-Fi & Bluetooth multiplayer and earn bragging rights while enjoying the winning moment!

WIN EXCITING CHALLENGES!
Play Career, Multiplayer, and the new Winner Take All Mode to become the All-Category Champion.

EXPERIENCE REAL SPORTS ACTION
Build a roster of your favorite sport robots and take on the Legends in enthralling arenas and stadiums. 

PVP & LIVE EVENTS
Challenge your friends, and battle in global events
Lead the Global Leaderboards

UPGRADE & COLOR YOUR CHAMPION
Fight and Upgrade your robot to be stronger, faster and meaner. Color your robot, express yourself and have some fun in the Paint shop!

SHOWCASE YOUR TRIUMPHS
Win Challenges and exhibit your achievements in an all-new Trophy Room.

ACHIEVE GLORY IN ARENAS
Reign supreme in 11 huge arenas that can barely contain these hulking mean machines.

RELIVE THE INSPIRING MOVIE
Play the official boxing game of the blockbuster movie Real Steel. Take your robot champion from the movie for amazing title winning experiences in this smash hit sequel.

JOIN THE ELITE CLUB OF REAL STEEL FANS
Enjoy regular news on game updates, robots, features, views, video tips and more for Free

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RealSteelWorldRobotBoxing
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/realsteelgames/
Capture player moments on Instagram: https://instagram.com/realsteelgames/

The game is also optimized for tablet devices

This game is completely free to download and play. However, some game power-ups can be purchased with real money within the game. You can restrict in-app purchases in your store‚Äôs settings.

* Permission:
STORAGE: for saving the data and progression.

Happy Halloween Champion!

Enjoy the new World Robot Boxing update.
comments: I to spent many hours and more money than I wanna admit on this game; only to log in today (10/23/29) to none of my robots. I immediately restored my purchases, and was only given 2 of the 7 robots I bought, not to mention any gold, silver, or any other robots i lost. Needless to say I'm not pleased, and it's come to my understanding that this is a quite frequent issue and it's outrageous that this issue hasn't been resolved yet nor have the means by which they handle it gotten better.

I have owned more than 50 robots including Zeus, Metro Gold, Midas Gold, Zeus Gold along with just 4 -5 Super bots remaining to bought and completed level 49. Most of the robots reached level 4 abilities after fully upgradation. Day before yesterday the game asked for update, after which the total picture changed. Now I am back to step one after updating and have lost all the robots. I am totally disappointed about this game. I want to remove all the stars but a single star remains constant.

It's a great game, brings me back to a younger age too! My only complaints is the ad after each fight, and the loading screen glitch and that come after collecting the milestone rewards. Other then that it's a great game and I highly recommend it!

OK what the hell. I think my phone died during a fight so I'm thinking whatever. I lost one no big deal. But the minute I freaking load up the game again all my progress is lost and I now have ZERO ROBOTS. is it because I didn't spend any money? Unbelievable

I have been playing this game for a while and then downloaded it on my current phone and I am now level 50 with every bot that is fully upgraded, other than a few super bots, Cardinal Chaos, Dark Fiend and Psytron, with 5400 Gold. Can you make them so you dont have to be VIP 7 to get them? But now a few days ago, my account said unauthorized access to the game, but now i am able to play some parts, but if i go into the store and live events it says it, can you please help me fix this?

comments: Amasing.., just amazing. It is a great game with awesome music, and I have minor complaints that are just me, and don't really effect the gameplay. 1. Press start last coin is a pain 2.nock em, is way to hard to be a hard rating. 3. Power trip backwards wave is a little bit tricky, (I love it though.) 4. It is a lttle bit add-heavy. (But that is how you make money so...) and 5. Power trip 75% is annoying. Over all, this is just me being nitpicky, great game. Good job robtop! Eddit: (2.2 when?)

This game is really Awesome! The Music, Effects, and more! My favorite level is Press Start, all people like press start because its has a really cool music. But the part that i hate in Press Start is the Last coin and that makes me hate the game :D Big thank you to the creators for creating this game! It cheers me up sometimes :)

This game is epic. Most of the 1 star reviews are people complaining on how it's so hard, how their device isn't the problem: the game is, and how it's so messed. But in reality, they just need practise, their device is the problem and the reason it had lost of ads is because this is one of the free games in the franchise kept up by ads. I love this game and hate it when noobs say how terrible it is when all they nerd to do is practice. If at first you don't succeed, try try again.

This game is soooooooooo fun and I'm not even joking. All of the levels are so hard but fun, all of the 1 star people are just noobs who aren't good at the game so they blame it on dumb reasons like oh when I press this it doesn't work, and stuff like that but in my opinion this game is really good and I'm enjoying it and I hope u do to

This game is sooo cool!!I just love the way the intensity of the music builds. And the PRESS START.....the level starts calmly....and then...... BOOM! It becomes so intense!! Especially when the PRESS START suddenly pops up i get so excited! I love it. This used to be DanTDM's intro so its gotta be great. No wonder why Dan played this game so much. Every single geometry dash game is awesome. Thank you to the games' creaters who are so genius.Thank you so much!

title: CHIROPRACTIC ADJUSTMENTS
description:
Chiropractic Adjustments - Spinal adjustment and chiropractic adjustment are terms used by chiropractors to describe their approaches to spinal manipulation, as well as some osteopaths, who use the term adjustment.

Spinal adjustments were among many chiropractic techniques invented in the 19th century by Daniel David Palmer, the founder of Chiropractic. Claims made for the benefits of spinal adjustments range from temporary, palliative (pain relieving) effects to long term wellness and preventive care. Despite anecdotal success, there is no scientific evidence that spinal adjustment is effective against disease.

The effects of spinal adjustment vary depending on the method performed. All techniques claim effects similar to other manual therapies, ranging from decreased muscle tension to reduced stress. Studies show that most patients go to chiropractors for musculoskeletal problems: 60% with low back pain, and the rest with head, neck and extremity symptoms. Chiropractic was to be a revolutionary system of healing based on the premise that neurologic dysfunction caused by ‚Äòimpinged‚Äô nerves at the spinal level was the cause of most disease. The mechanisms that are claimed to alter nervous system function and affect overall health are seen as speculative in nature, however, clinical trials have been conducted that include placebo-controlled comparisons and comparisons with other treatments. The American Chiropractic Association promotes chiropractic care of infants and children under the theory that poor posture and physical injury, including birth trauma, may be common primary causes of illness in children and can have a direct and significant impact not only on spinal mechanics, but on other bodily functions.

The effects of spinal manipulation have been shown to include: temporary relief of musculoskeletal pain, increased range of joint motion, changes in facet joint kinematics, increased pain tolerance and increased muscle strength. Common side effects of spinal manipulative therapy (SMT) are characterized as mild to moderate and may include: local discomfort, headache, tiredness, or radiating discomfort.

Install Chiropractic Adjustments app and learn more today.

title: Atomas
description:
Atomas is a fascinating incremental puzzle game, which you can learn in seconds but will entertain you for weeks. The perfect game for your spare time!

Your little universe starts with hydrogen atoms only but with the help of the energy rich plus atoms you are able to fusion two hydrogen atoms into one helium atom, 2 helium atoms into one lithium atom and so on. Your primary goal is to create the valuable elements like Gold, Platinum and Silver.

But watch out, if your universe is overfilled with to many atoms it will cause a big crunch and the game is over.
One way to prevent this is to build up long symmetries in your atoms and start big chain reactions.

From time to time minus atoms appear, use them for absorbing and replacing atoms within your universe or sacrifice them for a plus atom.

You see Atomas is not hard to play, but if you want to get to the top you'll need a good strategy, which keeps your atoms organized.

By creating new elements like oxygen or copper you unlock lucky charms, which effect the game in various ways and adjust it to your strategy.

What Atomas offers you:

- 4 different game modes
- simple but addicting game mechanics
- 124 different atoms to create 
- 12 different lucky charms
- Google play games leaderboards & achievements
- share your score on twitter and Facebook
- quick tutorial

The developers high score is 66 543. Can you do better?

Deutschland
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: Really great innovative puzzle game, which is really about symmetry. I love seeing new dynamics like this instead of just rehash after rehash of the same core mechanics. Highly recommended. Feedback For devs: It was very entertaining for 5-10 hours, but then I started to get bored and want some new ideas to play with. The fact that fusion is not predictable (when heavier element fuses into lighter element) makes some deeper strategies inaccessible.

I have absolutely no idea what this is about, what are the objectives, what happens and why, b'coz the tutorial explains nothing. Sometimes I finish a game, don't really know If I lost or won, or what, b'coz the game doesn't really say so. BUT! If you tap the same spot again and again, atoms emerge, and SUDDENLY, they start vanishing with each tap, until you are left with Beryllium or Lithium or stuff. Plus, the sounds are cool. So there!! 5 stars.

Played it over the years and still love it, but you guys should upload new screenshots to this page, the actual app looks way better. The lack off progress saves is disappointing, you loose everything when you uninstall the app, everything. Including antimatter, thats just like thievery... how could you provide an online transaction that isn't saved to your account, why eben allow account then...

I love this game. I'm addicted to it. I play every day, constantly trying to get farther, get a higher score. I only have one complaint. There is a bug in the game where, if you undo at a wrong moment, you could cause extra atoms to spawn around the circle, or if you undo a fusion, you could get the final atom and the atoms used to make it. Please fix this! It's frustrating when you have a good streak going, and you missclick and need to undo, just to have this glitch ruin a run

I really like the game, by which I mean my brain finds it pleasing, but my game progress does not transfer between devices, thus losing unlocked atom boosts, anti matter, best score, etc. I don't know if this is intentional, but it lost a üåü from me.

title: Wikipedia
description:
The best Wikipedia experience on your Mobile device. Ad-free and free of charge, forever. With the official Wikipedia app, you can search and explore 40 million+ articles in 300+ languages, no matter where you are.

== What people say about the app ==

‚ÄúIt works without mocking, mistakes, advertisements, all sorts of snaps, and that probably is the most important thing.‚Äù ‚Äì Balan Radu

‚ÄúEverything and more. Free, objective, impartial and neutral. What more could you want?‚Äù ‚Äì Enzo Sinapsi

‚ÄúIt's an essential application for a person like me who is in an academic career.‚Äù ‚Äì A Google User

‚ÄúWikipedia is a complete solution to all of your doubts. If you search anything on the Wikipedia it gives you accurate results about it.‚Äù ‚Äì Debraj Bhattacharya

== Why you‚Äôll love the this app ==

1. It‚Äôs free and open
Wikipedia is the encyclopedia that anyone can edit. Articles on Wikipedia are freely licensed and the app code is 100% open source. The heart and soul of Wikipedia is a community of people working to bring you unlimited access to free, reliable and neutral information.

2. No ads
Wikipedia is a place to learn, not a place for advertising. This app is made by the Wikimedia Foundation, a nonprofit organization that supports and operates Wikipedia. We provide this service in the pursuit of open knowledge that‚Äôs always ad-free and never tracks your data. 

3. Read in your language
Search 40 million articles in over 300 languages in the world‚Äôs largest source of information. Set your preferred languages in the app and easily switch between them when browsing or reading. 

4. Use it offline
Save your favorite articles and read Wikipedia offline with ‚ÄúMy lists‚Äú. Name lists as you like and collect articles across different languages. Saved articles and reading lists are synced across all your devices and are available even when you do not have internet connectivity.

5. Attention to detail and night mode
The app embraces Wikipedia‚Äôs simplicity and adds delight to it. A beautiful and distraction-free interface lets you focus on the essential: reading articles. With text size adjustment and themes in pure black, dark, sepia or light, you can choose the most pleasant reading experience for you.

== Broaden your horizon with these features == 

1. Customize your Explore feed
‚ÄúExplore‚Äú lets you see recommended Wikipedia content including current events, popular articles, captivating freely-licensed photos, events on this day in history, suggested articles based on your reading history, and more.

2. Find and search 
Quickly find what you're looking for by searching within articles or with the search bar at the top of the app. You can even search using your favorite emojis or voice-enabled search.

== We‚Äôd love your feedback ==

1. To send feedback from the app: 
In the menu, press "Settings", then "About the Wikipedia app", then "Send app feedback".

2. If you have experience with Java and the Android SDK, then we look forward to your contributions! More info: https://mediawiki.org/wiki/Wikimedia_Apps/Team/Android/App_hacking 

3. By using this app, you agree to the automatic transmission of crash reports to a third-party service provider. If you would like to disable this feature, press "Settings," then turn off "Send crash reports" under the Privacy section.

4. Explanation of permissions needed by the app: https://mediawiki.org/wiki/Wikimedia_Apps/Android_FAQ#Security_and_Permissions 

5. Privacy policy: https://m.wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Privacy_policy 

6. Crash report third-party service provider‚Äôs privacy policy:
https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement 

7. Terms of Use: https://m.wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use 

8. About the Wikimedia Foundation:
The Wikimedia Foundation is a charitable nonprofit organization that supports and operates Wikipedia and the other Wiki projects. It is funded mainly through donations. For more information, please visit our website: https://wikimediafoundation.org/
