summary: The official app for Wikipedia, the world‚Äôs largest source of information.
recentChanges:
- Updated design of Search interface. Search your reading lists, browsing history, and Wikipedia itself from a single place.
- Minor bug fixes and enhancements.
comments: As the old saying goes "don't fix it if it ain't broke". Previously, users were able to choose where to save an article, now the article is automatically saved to the list "Saved". Now, if users want to circumvent such automatic saving, you added the options "Add to another...", "Move from..." and "Remove from..." --- problem with that is that these options COULD ALL BE TRIVIALIZED if the previous system was still in place.

After using wikipedia app for about 2 years, I've been encountered some problem,first when you want to read the article that has been saved,sometimes it doesn't load at all,and tell me that i do not connected to the internet even though i already downloaded it,two when it successfully load the page there are some photos that's not loaded,so i don't really know the context of the description of the pictures

Love this app, love wikipedia. Far better than searching Wikipedia articles in a browser on mobile. It's easy to use and the in-page seach function is particularly useful, as well as the quick introduction pieces you would normally only be able to access by hovering over a link on a PC or laptop. The quick edits are pretty good, if I'm bored I might steamroller through a couple of image captions or article descriptions. I also enjoy reading the main page in the morning.

Five stars when the many bugs in the latest version (as of 2020-10-29) are corrected. A pleasure to browse, when working! For now, though: üî∏ I've tested on several devices. The 'loading' animation is endless, and the first paragraph or more is missing. Also, it's now hard to get to History.

Wikipedia is the best thing on the internet. Keep this app on your phone and you will benifit from it. App layout is very nice and clean. Articles can be saved offline and synched across devices. You can customize font size, page color and change language of article.

title: Babbel - Learn Languages - Spanish, French & More
description:
Millions of people learn languages with Babbel ‚Äî the app built by language learning experts. Our short, interactive lessons rethink old-school language education to get you speaking a new language in 2020 with confidence.

LEARN SPANISH OR 13 OTHER LANGUAGES

We're not just a Spanish learning app! Want to learn French, learn German or speak Italian like a local? With so many languages to choose from, it‚Äôs up to you!

Spanish üá™üá∏üá≤üáΩ | French üá´üá∑ | Italian üáÆüáπ | German üá©üá™ | Portuguese üáßüá∑ | Russian üá∑üá∫ | Polish üáµüá± | 
Turkish üáπüá∑ | Norwegian üá≥üá¥ | Danish üá©üá∞ | Swedish üá∏üá™ | Dutch üá≥üá± | Indonesian üáÆüá© | English üá¨üáßüá∫üá∏

Babbel is great for beginners but even experienced learners have proven to advance their conversation skills!*

======

BABBEL WORKS!
‚òÖ Effectiveness backed by researchers at Yale University:
100% of study participants improved their oral proficiency in 3 months*

‚òÖ After 10 hours with Babbel, Michigan State University researchers found:
96% of learners saw better test scores on grammar and vocabulary**

‚òÖ PCMagazine says the Babbel language app ‚Äúexceeds expectations‚Äù 

======

Babbel is the best language-learning app.

Our language learning experts build every course tailored to your native language. So whether you want to learn Spanish, learn Italian or learn French ‚Äî or even German, Portuguese, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Dutch, Indonesian or English ‚Äî you‚Äôll learn quickly and effectively.

BITE-SIZE, INTERACTIVE LESSONS - Easily fit language learning into your busy schedule with lessons that take only 10-15 minutes to complete (some Spanish lessons are even shorter).

LANGUAGES FOR ANY SITUATION - Find language lessons for travel, work, everyday life and much, much more

LISTEN, SPEAK, READ, WRITE - Practice all the elements of language learning and start speaking real-life conversations 

IMPROVE YOUR PRONUNCIATION - Babbel‚Äôs speech recognition technology helps you sound like a native speaker

REMEMBER WHAT YOU LEARN -  Use the review feature so the previous lessons stick, and understand grammar (including Spanish conjugation)

LEARN LANGUAGES IN CONTEXT - Enhance your language learning with tips & tricks that guide you throughout lessons

OVER 6,000 LANGUAGE COURSES - Learn Spanish and 13 other languages with in-depth content, including more than 60,000 language lessons

With Babbel, you‚Äôll be on your way to mastering the ultimate goal of language learning ‚Äî having real-life conversations with confidence. Whether you need a Spanish learning app or a French learning app, you‚Äôve always wanted to learn Italian, you‚Äôre looking to dive into German language learning or improve your English, Babbel is the choice of millions of people looking to enhance their language education.

Make learning a habit. Go beyond language 101 and you'll learn Spanish (or another language!) that you can use to talk in real-life situations.

======

Subscriptions:

You‚Äôll need a subscription to use Babbel fully. Your subscription will be renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period.

DOWNLOAD BABBEL AND TRY FOR FREE ‚Äì Your first lesson is on us. Babbel is completely ad-free.

Privacy policy: https://about.babbel.com/en/privacy/
Terms of use: https://about.babbel.com/en/terms/

Not a native speaker but want to talk just like one? Download Babbel and improve your German language learning, learn English or discover how to speak Spanish. Take your language education to new levels ‚Äî learn French, Italian, English, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Dutch, or Indonesian.

Contact us:
Questions, comments or feedback about language learning with Babbel? Email us at support-mobile@babbel.com.

*Based on a study conducted with Babbel users learning Spanish. Available at http://bit.ly/BabbelYale.

**Based on a study conducted with Babbel users learning Spanish. Available: http://bit.ly/BabbelMSU.

Whether you need a Spanish learning app or a French learning app, you‚Äôve always wanted to learn Italian, you‚Äôre looking to dive into German language learning or improve your English, Babbel is the choice of millions of people looking to enhance their language education.

Make learning a habit. Go beyond language 101 and you'll learn Spanish (or another language!) that you can use to talk in real-life situations.

======

Subscriptions:

You‚Äôll need a subscription to use Babbel fully. Your subscription will be renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period.

DOWNLOAD BABBEL AND TRY FOR FREE ‚Äì Your first lesson is on us. Babbel is completely ad-free.

Privacy policy: https://about.babbel.com/en/privacy/
Terms of use: https://about.babbel.com/en/terms/

Not a native speaker but want to talk just like one? Download Babbel and improve your German language learning, learn English or discover how to speak Spanish. Take your language education to new levels ‚Äî learn French, Italian, English, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Dutch, or Indonesian.

comments: So over all it is a very good learning experience. The courses are planned wel and it seems that the developers put a large amount of work into this. But as a subscription app that is not that cheap. I has some very frustrating bugs. In the Dutch course you don't have the char ' that is very important for spelling and there is no way around it. And the speaking practice is really bad sometimes that I have gave up using it in the last 2 months. Without those few bugs I would give it 5/5

I had a weird issue to where it wouldn't let me log in saying "Try again later". I uninstalled the app and reinstalled it, it seems to have done the trick. I hope this isn't a recurring issue with the app apart from the voice recognition that others were talking about. It's kind of funny what it thinks you say. It thought I said "Skin store" instead of "Stimmt so". I'll use the other options of reviewing German until voice recognition is fixed. Others should do the same to save any frustration.

This is an awsome app! You are able to learn any language, and you are able to choose if you wanna talk or not, it also tells you if tou should start learning again, or when another level is unlocked! Again like I said the best app ever, I have learned both Spanish and French with this app!

FIXED!!! App doesn't sync lessons completed on the browser. The app itself is great and I've already learnt a lot more in a short time in comparison to other apps because Babbel mixes different topics so it's not boring. That was the thing that slowed my progress before. This app has realistic conversations so you get used to actual language, not just repeating isolated phrases like "Brot und Wasser" twenty times like a drill exercise.

Great app but the lessons are too long and sometimes have 2 halves that are seemingly unrelated. Today I learned about trying on clothes and numbers by the hundred. If these had been 2 seperate lessons in the same course, I wouldn't have minded. But it takes so long to do them at the same time and I can't save my progress. Please either split up the lessons or add an ability to save position in a lesson

title: Powerful Cleaner (Boost&Clean)
description:
Powerful Cleaner (Boost&Clean) is a super lite and effective memory boost tool and battery extender. It is helps to clean unnecessary apps in the background to boost your phone and save battery power. With proper management, its can make your mobile faster. 

Powerful Cleaner (Boost&Clean) uses the accessibility service. With this service, you can get an upgraded cache cleaner. Its can help you to force-stop the unnecessary application in background by ‚ÄúOne-step‚Äù.

We do not provide the service/content for any minors under 16 years old (or equivalent minimum age in relevant jurisdiction). If you are a minor meeting the above conditions, you must read the terms of User Agreement and use this app under the guidance of your guardian, and confirm that your guardian agrees to your Use of this app.

‚òÖJunk File Clean
Intelligent Cloud Engine reads everything and will make the junk files nowhere to hide. Powerful Cleaner (Boost&Clean) could clean the junk files, idle storage and useless large files from millions of apps, thus releasing plenty of free space.

‚òÖMemory Boost
By cleaning unnecessary background apps and process, the memory booster of Powerful Cleaner (Boost&Clean) can free up memory, make Android phone to run faster, and save much more battery power. With accessibility, this accelerator can prevent apps from auto restart and therefore provide durable boost effect to make phone faster. 

‚òÖCPU Cooler
This cleaner has accelerator which can detect and clean apps that consume CPU capacity highly and cause overheating. And by memory booster, it can cool down Android device as quickly as possible.

‚òÖApp Lock
With password to save you private applications.

comments: A convenient screen locker....I don't want it! But, it won't let me turn off that option. Every time I turn off the "convenient" screen locker, it reactivates on its own. When I turn it off, it displays the words "A Convenient Screen Locker", and it has the options "Yes" and "Stay". Either fix it right now, or I will uninstall it. There is nothing convenient about an unwanted screen locker that I don't have the option of deactivating. Are we clear on this? Update a few minutes later: You know what? This is too annoying to wait any longer. I already installed a better app that has better quality than this one. Therefore, I'm uninstalling this one. Good luck with your screen locker that can't be deactivated. See how many people will stick around for it.

This app is packed full with ads - the worst I have ever seen. It even interrupts you when on other apps, like Camera, and taking pictures, to play 2 ads in a row, one of which can't be turned off for as long as 11 seconds. Even when the app has been turned off. At every step, it will play as many as 4 ads in a row before letting you go on to the next step. This means you will have to page through 4 to 8 ads total just to perform one step of a function in the app. It plays 2 ads when your clock plays a preset alarm before you can turn the alarm off. Also to turn off your phone's screen, and when you try to wake the phone up from sleep. The cleaning functions all work ok, but they are nothing special. AVOID THIS APP. It is a complete pain.

Some of the fonts in other apps have change to outline after using this spp. I like help but not unnecessary changes. It is hard to read outline words. Hope you can look into this matter. Will things be back to normal should I uninstall this app.

I have always downloaded the CM Apps...Launcher, Security, Cleaner, Booster, Locker...etc Before I activate any new phone I make sure my CM Apps are in place. I have had very good results with the CM Guys and Gals and keep up the Fantastic Job !!! Colleen

Terrible, terrible app. Unlock your phone and see an app. Unlock your phone to see the weather you never asked for. Whenever you plug it in to charge, it locks the phone. More of an inconvenience than useful

title: calimoto ‚Äì Motorcycle Rides & Offline GPS
description:
Winding country roads, nature and freedom. We want every rider to find the perfect route. Therefore, we have developed an app designed for motorcyclists. True to our motto ‚Äúno more straight roads‚Äù.

Whether you are looking for a nice route from A to B or a spontaneous round trip ‚Äì our specialized winding road algorithm will always deliver the best ride. If you have a specific destination in mind calimoto will provide you with the perfect route along winding country roads. You want a spontaneous tour for two hours? calimoto will calculate the appropriate round trip so you are back on time. Your motorcycle satnav and route planner ‚Äì anywhere on your smartphone.

Your tour planner on your smartphone
-        Our unique winding road algorithm designed for motorcycle drivers will guide you along the nicest winding country roads.
-        Create your own custom tour with unlimited via points.
-        Choose from four different route options. They can be set for the whole trip or even sections of the route between each waypoint!
-        Find POIs like gas stations, restaurants and accommodation, and integrate them in your route.
-        The Calimeter scores your tour and let's you know how twisty it will be. A high Calimeter means lots of twists and turns!

Clear overview with our motorcycle map
-       Winding country roads are highlighted in the map
-       You're an Enduro rider? All off-road tracks are shown in the map.

Looking for a spontaneous round trip
-        Simply provide the desired length and the calimoto winding road algorithm will do the rest.
-        You want to stop on your motorcycle meeting? No problem! Simply long click on a via point and drag it to the preferred location.

Discover thousands of tour recommendations
-        Let yourself be inspired by the experiences of our community.
-        Browse through recommended tours in your area or worldwide.
-        Various filters help you find the perfect ride!

Turn-by-turn voice navigation
-        Found the perfect route? The calimoto navigation will guide you!
-        Simply mount the smartphone onto your bike or put it in your pocket and use the voice navigation.
-        Your fuel light comes on? The next gas station is only 3 clicks away. Afterwards calimoto directs you right back onto the route.
-        Get notified about danger zones (e.g. speed cameras) directly during your navigation.

Tour catalog
-        Save your favorite routes and explore them as many times as you want.
-        Convert your driven tours and revive your past adventures with calimoto.

Tour analysis
-         Check out your maximum lean angle for each tour.
-         Visualize your speed, altitude, acceleration and lean angle for each tour in graphs. 
-         Rate and add pictures to your ride then publish it to our tour recommendations to share it with the community.

Share your adventures
-        Share your favorite trips with Facebook, WhatsApp or directly inside the app.
-        Become a part of the calimoto community and take advantage of the experience of thousands of other bikers.

Tracking
-        Just riding? calimoto will take care of tracking your adventure.
-        Driven tracks are shown on the map to show you where the next adventure is waiting for you.

Sign up to our community
-       Create a calimoto profile and we show you how many kilometers you have driven with calimoto.
-       All your tours are always synchronized with all your devices.
-       Manage your own bike inside the app.

Try calimoto for free and discover winding roads, exciting routes and interesting tours in your area. Become a Premium member now and get unlimited access to all maps and exclusive features like measuring your lean angle or your acceleration on all of your tours, as well as danger zone alerts (e.g. radar warnings). calimoto ‚Äì your motorcycle app! From bikers for bikers!

recentChanges:
We were busy biker bees
- Some tours were supposedly too long to start
- There were problems with the display of favorites in the offline map and when tours crossed national boundaries
- In addition, only tours that you have driven yourself are now shown on the map.
... and a few minor improvements you won't notice

Thank you for all the feedback and wish you a good trip with calimoto!
comments: I have had multiple apps for rides but none compares to calimoto. There are more things to do than just track your ride and choose other's rides that they have done. I also love that you can hear the turn by turn directions with out having to pay. It's a safe thing to not always need your eyes on you phone to know where your going. To generate a random route is super easy too for a quick get up and go ride. I have gotten rid of all other apps. I'm keeping this one‚ù§Ô∏è!

AVOID AVOID AVOID. Requires an account just to see what features are available, restricts what maps you have access to strict "regions". Totally useless for my use. Frustratingly, that was not made clear prior to the requirement to make an account. Disappointing practices. Email sent to have account details deleted from their systems. Edit: 1* got your attention and will remain. Take this as feedback regarding the login requirement. I'm really not interested in jumping though hoops...

Fun app but it does not have a lot of specific addresses or locations. Example: you want to go to a specific restaurant chain, it won't find it or the closest one. But I guess it was not meant for that. Still, it is fun to use for random rides.
Great route app but you do have to check the route after it is generated. Sometimes it will send you down and obscure street and then turn around and rejoin the route.

Overall, this is one of the best apps I've used for motorcycle navigation! I have one tissue that keeps me from giving it five stars. When doing turn-by-turn navigation, it does not display the street name that you're supposed to turn on. This makes it a little confusing especially when there are a bunch of streets next to each other. Other than that, great app!

title: The Survival Hunter Games 2
description:
The game comes fully loaded with amazing features! Our new game interface is extremely user friendly, and boasts easy to play touch screen controls that allow you to effortlessly run, jump, sprint, reload, aim, shoot and more! 

The new menu screen includes map style level select and settings screen. Gain game insight in between maps during loading with tip screens, and begin each game with mission style instructions! Before you begin your first level, you can watch a short video ad in order to earn a power up. You may opt not to watch, but you'll lose out on the advantage. 

As soon as the game begins, a timer will begin to count down. If you are able to beat the level quickly enough, you will earn a permanent weapon, which can be used in all other levels! If you do not beat the clock, you can still advance through the game, just without the permanent weapon. 

Fight stronger, more intelligent enemies, who make this game an intense battle of wit, stealth and skill! Enjoy hand-to-hand combat and precision aiming to take down enemies. Collect your blocky weapons and get ready to aim and shoot!!

Features:
-User friendly interface with touch pad controls
-Timers
-Power-ups
-Ammo and weapon collection
-Jump, aim and run
-Mini-map to spot your dangerous foes
-Mission orders
-Hand-to-hand combat

title: Modern Strike Online: Free PvP FPS shooting game
description:
Modern Strike Online:
Can't get enough PvP FPS action games? Looking for the most free killing FPS games around?
Well you're in luck! Modern Strike Online has awesome FPS game needs covered and then some!
GO into the awesome pc games graphics and dynamic shooter game.  Play online with your friends for the best FPS action PvP special battles you've ever seen! The best thing to happen to mobile in the style of everyone's favorite call of duty, csgo and pubg!

Free FPS game:
5 popular combat shooting modes for single or multiplayer PvP battles! Clans wars and special gun wars!
Free Daily rewards! Play every day to claim your free prizes and complete daily tasks! Easy and intuitive combat controls!
50 unique weapon types: combat pistols, awp rifles, cool machine guns, swat shotguns and other special ops weapons!
CSGO style Weapon skins! Optimization for weak devices!
Call of beautiful modern pc game graphics just as detailed as on PCs! Easy and intuitive controls!

Awesome 5v5 PvP battles:
14 unique 5v5 PvP maps with different surroundings and their own original style! Play awesome games with your own rules! 
You'll need good FPS games tactics, strategic thinking and teamwork to win! Find your enemy's weak spots and win!

Popular action game modes:
TDM! Two teams go head-to-head. The goal: destroy and frag your opponents! Dominate the battlefield with your friends!
Call of Deathmatch battles! It's every  special ops soldier for themselves! Free for all pvp battle for the most skilled FPS soldiers!
Plant the bomb battle! The terrorist team plants a bomb, and the special forces team tries to stop them! Just like in Call of duty,  d day and CSGO.
Special OPS operations: Two teams battle it out with just one life per round. The winning team is whoever has at least one soldier standing at the end.

Multiplayer shooting games:
Fight for your place on the PvP leaderboard! Upgrade your combat armor and weapons, and choose your favorite pg skins. Thanks to optimal game balance, realistic sounds, and awesome pc game graphics.

Popular FPS shooter:
Online FPS combat inspired by cod, pubg and csgo: the best thing to happen to your phone!
50ml+ online players all over the world!

comments: Thanks for sorting out the issue I had with game. The issue was resolved very quickly. I have to say MSO is an awesome must play FPS game. If you are wondering if you should download it or not. Just go for it. It is definitely worth it. The graphics are good, the characters and guns, although a bit expensive, are good and definitely worth it. Thank you Azur Interactive Games Limited for this awesome game. And for all those saying this game only favours pay to win. I can only say that, for any game you want to be good at, at least invest some time into it. Level grinding is the term for you. If you play the game with some brains and not just get any gun then it will surely be worth it. Not all the guns are supposed to be good and that is the fun fact. Do some research about what each gun features itself with. If you do that this game will be much more interesting. I would definitely recommend this game to everyone who likes FPS. Just go for it.

Very good game..improvements can be made when it comes unto upgrade points. It is too hard to achieve such a great amount of points to fully upgrade armour and weapons just by using chests and the other means you have. I think it should be more user friendly to players that are not able to use funds to purchase weapons and upgrade points. Additional stages , locations and weapons would be very nice as well. Im not a fan of the biohazard theme as well it's not appealing. overall very good game

This game is fun and it's kinda like csgo, everyone should go ahead and download it, though it might be fun and all it also has its flaws,the game closes itself right when you're in the middle of the match and then it asks you to send feedback to the developer,but the developers don't even respond so I hope they here me and help me fix this game

Fun, first person shooter and quality game for the price......FREE! Controls take time to learn a little wonky but manageable on my galaxy Tab. Definitely give it a try guys. Only thing I would change is give it a off line option with computer AI, so I can play it when I'm on the airplane for hours. Thanks. Oh and hey developers please toss a couple upgrades into my account üòÅü§´

Like it so far. Hopefully it doesn't freeze up on me. It takes in app purchases to beat the other teams. Its difficult to start out with just the basics but eventually you'll get there unless you are willing to spend money just to get what you want! I have so many online games, this isn't the only one I play. But I like them all...just want to say good luck to whomever decides to download this awesome game it has clear graphics and its easy to use the controls.

title: Medical Trivia - Quiz And Learn
description:
Keep your medical knowledge up to date. Can't remember that term, do not worry this app has it all. You are 100% guaranteed to find the information you want. All at your fingertips, and available OFFLINE 24/7.

Never worry about the accuracy of the information because all of the Medical terms are taken from the World Health Organisation (WHO) publication and the US National Library of Medicine database. There are over 30000 terms encompassing diverse areas of medical science.

[Features]
‚àö Lightweight & available offline
‚àö Look up terms
‚àö Easy and convenient user interface
‚àö No intrusive advertisements
‚àö Track your progress in trivia
‚àö Use our star system to see how well you are doing
‚àö Accurate information taken from the WHO and the US National Library of Medicine

Your one-stop app for biology definitions, medical definitions. Medical trivia, medical quiz, medical terms etc. The app also contains a world-class trivia. Use it to test your knowledge or as a reference or to improve your general knowledge, it's up to you how you use it.

Suitable for students or anyone in the healthcare industry such as doctors (MBBS, MD, DO, Ph.D.), nurses, paramedics, pharmacist(Pharm.D.), midwife, vet, radiologist etc. 
Master the definitions to get an edge in the school tests, fellowships and interviews such as USMLE, NEET, UKCAT, BMAT, GAMSAT, TMS, PCAT, MCAT, PGMET, JIPMER, MCCEE, AMC, CAT, GRE, MCQ Examination etc.

descriptionHTML:
Keep your medical knowledge up to date. Can't remember that term, do not worry this app has it all. You are 100% guaranteed to find the information you want. All at your fingertips, and available OFFLINE 24/7.

Never worry about the accuracy of the information because all of the Medical terms are taken from the World Health Organisation (WHO) publication and the US National Library of Medicine database. There are over 30000 terms encompassing diverse areas of medical science.

[Features]
‚àö Lightweight & available offline
‚àö Look up terms
‚àö Easy and convenient user interface
‚àö No intrusive advertisements
‚àö Track your progress in trivia
‚àö Use our star system to see how well you are doing
‚àö Accurate information taken from the WHO and the US National Library of Medicine

Your one-stop app for biology definitions, medical definitions. Medical trivia, medical quiz, medical terms etc. The app also contains a world-class trivia. Use it to test your knowledge or as a reference or to improve your general knowledge, it's up to you how you use it.

Suitable for students or anyone in the healthcare industry such as doctors (MBBS, MD, DO, Ph.D.), nurses, paramedics, pharmacist(Pharm.D.), midwife, vet, radiologist etc.
Master the definitions to get an edge in the school tests, fellowships and interviews such as USMLE, NEET, UKCAT, BMAT, GAMSAT, TMS, PCAT, MCAT, PGMET, JIPMER, MCCEE, AMC, CAT, GRE, MCQ Examination etc.

title: Verizon Call Filter
description:
Your phone is your door to the world, and you shouldn't open it for just anyone. With Call Filter, you can screen incoming calls, auto-block spam and report any unwanted numbers. Or, upgrade to Call Filter Plus with Caller ID for added security. Put a name to the unknown numbers, make your own personal block list, and even assess the risk level of incoming calls. Enroll today and start answering with confidence.

 

Key Features:

‚Ä¢ Get real-time alerts on your incoming call screen so you can better avoid spam calls

‚Ä¢ Automatically send spam callers to voicemail with the spam filter

‚Ä¢ Report a number as spam so you can help improve our algorithm

‚Ä¢ See each spam call‚Äôs level of risk so that you can learn more about the caller

‚Ä¢ Manage other unwanted calls with a personal spam and block list

‚Ä¢ Block all incoming calls from international numbers

‚Ä¢ Search our spam database to see if a number has already been identified as spam

‚Ä¢ Identify unknown numbers by name on the incoming call screen, call log and eligible messaging apps, even if the caller is not saved to your contacts

‚Ä¢ Seamlessly update your contacts with newly identified numbers

 

Eligible customers get a 10-day trial of Call Filter Plus. Customers can choose to enroll in Call Filter to get just the basics (spam detection, blocking and reporting) for free, or subscribe to Call Filter Plus for all that and more for $2.99 per month, per line. Accounts with 3 or more eligible lines can subscribe to Call Filter Plus (Multi-line) for $7.99/mo by logging in to My Verizon. If you choose to enroll in Call Filter or Call Filter Plus via the app, the spam filter will be automatically set to block high-risk spam callers, but you can change your block settings at any time. Data charges apply.

 

Please reference https://www.vzw.com/support/how-to-use-call-filter/ and https://www.vzw.com/support/call-filter-faqs/ for step-by-step instructions on how to use the app and answers to frequently asked questions. For additional details on Call Filter and Call Filter Plus, please see https://www.verizonwireless.com/solutions-and-services/call-filter/.

developerAddress: One Verizon Way, Basking Ridge, New Jersey
recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: Absolutely the worst...DOES NOT filter the "unknown name" calls which are usually spoofed numbers anyway, and are scammers, even though there is a feature to filter "unknown name" calls....IT DOES NOT WORK!!! Verizon and all of the other cell service providers have yet to figure this s**t out, yet expect YOU to pay your f***ing bill every month. PISS POOR SERVICE!!!

This app is horrible, If I could give it Zero stars I would. I pay every month to use this app, but blocked calls still continue to come through, I get the notifications of the blocked calls, and they are able to leave voice mails. Every time this app updates it gets worse. All the damn money I pay a month for the service would think it would be a little but better but no Verizon is rip offs! This app was great until 10 updates ago, now it's junk! If it ain't broken, don't fix it!

Piece of Junk. The thing is enabled and I still get calls daily saying I won a free stay at a Marriott hotel. This call comes from a different number every day so blocking one number (on my phone) doesn't help so I thought this app would do a better job. I'd have better luck teaching my dog long division.

I seem to get more spam calls since they implemented this than i did before it existed. Half the time, calls marked "possible spam" are my actual health insurance trying to contact me. Worst part is, they charge for a version they claim is better. Anyone risking money on this app has lost their minds!! Blocking spam calls/texts should be the DUTY of the provider; NOT a service they charge extra for.

this app works okay but it doesn't truly block calls they will burp in to let me know I'm getting a block call that certainly defeats the purpose of blocking the calls. It also allows the block calls to leave voice messages. Unknown calls and restricted calls should automatically be blocked but they aren't. Calls it do not ID the callers should be blocked also automatically.

title: Ink Inc. - Tattoo Drawing
description:
Are you ready to experience your inner rebel? Ever wonder what it is like to get a tattoo? Now you can experience it all without feeling the pain! Fill in hundreds of different tats for your customers. Try to get the picture as close as possible for them and don‚Äôt mess up!. Get ready to feel the satisfaction of watching your art become real tattoos! Relax and use your precision to point and aim the needle to fill in the shapes. So many satisfying vibrations! Fun and easy to pick up but don‚Äôt miss an ink... Will you be the first one to tattoo them all?

Hundreds of objects for you to carefully size up, outline, and ink your customers. The final results will leave you feeling satisfied! 
 
 Game Features:

1.       Simple but addicting mechanics
Feel the satisfaction without the pain? The pictures are there for you. All you need to do is fill in the ink. Take your time and relax, it‚Äôs the simple.

2.       Run your own Tattoo Shop
Keep the customers coming. Whether its a heart, a zombie, or a skull, there are so many tattoo designs for you to stencil.

3.        Don‚Äôt go over the lines!!
Challenging shapes will test your precision. Can you beat each level in one hit?

4.        Feel the experience
Feel every needle tap with the best haptics experience there is.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Whether you like tattoos or just want to draw some shapes, Ink Inc. will take you there. This is the best and most rewarding tattoo simulation game there is. Good luck putting down Ink Inc!

Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

Follow us to get news and updates on our other Award Winning titles;
https://lionstudios.cc/
Facebook.com/LionStudios.cc
Instagram.com/LionStudioscc
Twitter.com/LionStudiosCC
Youtube.com/c/LionStudiosCC

comments: Super fun game! I constantly keep looking for new updates because of how addicting it is! Though one thing I would improve is there are some pictures that no matter what I do, I can't get 3 stars. It always comes up as 2 1/2 even if it looks good. Other than that, I love it! Definitely better than when it first started!

This is a fun, interesting, enjoyable, artistic, and creative game! I like picking techniques to use for each tattoo. I am finding this game to be somewhat addictive as well. One of my friends plays too, so sometimes I also send her screenshots of what I make. The different tatoos are interesting and make me laugh!

I would be giving it 5 stars except for 1 VERY ANOYING thing.. Its bad enough when you get bombarded by ads from a game but what really upsets me the most is with NO warning at all an add will start right in the middle of you drawing or filling in a spot and when the ad finishes and comes back to the game the gun goes haywire and messes up the whole picture and you have to start all over or also in the middle of drawing or filling the settings menu will keep popping up and doing the same thing.

Very nice app/game, I thoroughly loved it. Very nice graphics, controls and as the levels were increasing the drawings were getting harder and harder to play. If you are finding a game of Tattoos üéÆüì±then I would prefer this game to play or download. Thanks LION STUDIOS for giving/creating this beautiful app. THANKS A LOT!üôÇüôè REALLY LOVED THIS GAME!‚ù£Ô∏èüôèüëçüëçüí´üëå‚ú®

I love the game however I got 2 stars out first cause there's a glitch that we put it right and it puts an angry face. Second cause when I sometimes start the game it's normal but then when i click things it doesn't bring me to the ink tattoo tasks. Please fix those bugs

title: Somali Medical Phrases - Works offline
description:
Military-related phrases for language learners. With text and audio.

Using this app, you can select an English phrase and view its translation and how to pronounce it in the foreign language.

This app was originally developed as an entry to the 2010 CIO/G6 "Apps for the Army" competition, and it is based on the modules publicly available online from the U.S. Defense Language Institute. While this app's subject matter relates mainly to military topics, the app is broadly useful with content relating to a range of topics.

‚òÖ Easy to use
‚òÖ Native speaker audio
‚òÖ Dictionary lookup
‚òÖ Pronunciation help: Transliteration/Romanization text
‚òÖ Over 600 phrases
‚òÖ Voice-based lookup (speak the phrase you want in English)
‚òÖ Good for language learning, or as a reference
‚òÖ Free and unlimited

This is part of a series of phrasebook apps published for many different languages and dialects. Phrasebooks in the series are available as "basic" and "medical" variants.

‚òÖ Text may be exported as Anki flash cards
‚òÖ Works offline: No network connection is required
‚òÖ Search bar for quick vocabulary lookup
‚òÖ No login or registration needed
‚òÖ Dark background color minimizes eye strain

Many of the languages covered by this series of phrasebook apps are under-resourced, with translation apps and dictionaries not widely available from other sources.

*BASIC* phrasebooks contain the following categories of phrases:

Commands, Warnings and Instructions
Helpful Words, Phrases and Questions
Greetings and Introductions
Interrogation
Numbers
Days of the Week/Time
Directions
Locations
Descriptions (Colors, Shapes, Sizes, Tastes, Qualities, Quantities)
Emergency Terms
Food and Sanitation
Fuel and Maintenance
Medical Terms/General
Medical Terms/Parts of the Body
Military Ranks
Lodging
Occupations
Customs (Port of Entry)
Relatives
Weather
General Military Terms
Mine Warfare Terms

*MEDICAL* phrasebooks contain the following categories of phrases:

Introduction
Guidance
Registration
Assessment
Surgical Consent
Trauma
Procedures
Foley (Catheter)
Surgery Instructions
Pain Interview
Medicine Interview
Orthopedic
Obstetrics/Gynecology
Pediatrics
Cardiology
Ophthalmology
Neurology
Exam Commands
Caregiver
Post-Op/Prognosis
Medical Conditions
Pharmaceutical
Diseases

How to use

1. Choose a subject category from the menu. That category will be expanded.
2. From the expanded list of phrases shown, tap on the phrase you want.
3. On the phrase detail page, the phrase itself is shown alongside its pronunciation and the equivalent English phrase. Press the Play button to hear the audio pronunciation by a native speaker.

Ideal for

üåê U.S. Military service members
üåê Language learners
üåê Doctors, nurses, and medical staff
üåê Travelers
üåê Aid workers
üåê Linguists

Other languages and dialects available in this series

Albanian, Algerian, Amharic, Azeri, Baluchi, Bengali, Bosnian, Burmese, Cantonese, Cebuano, Chavacano, Croatian, Czech, Dari, Egyptian, Emirati, French, Gan (Jiangxinese), Georgian, Gujarati, Haitian, Hassaniya, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Igbo, Ilocano, Indonesian (Bahasa), Iraqi, Japanese, Javanese, Jordanian, Kashmiri, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean (North), Kosovar (Albanian), Kurmanji, Kyrgyz, Lebanese, Libyan, Lingala, Malay, Mandarin, Mongolian, Moroccan, Nepali, Palestinian, Pashto (Afgh.), Pashto (Pak.), Persian-Farsi, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Europe), Punjabi, Quechua, Russian, Saudi, Serbian, Sindhi, Somali, Sorani, Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Venezuela), Sudanese, Swahili, Syrian, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamashek, Tamil, Tausug, Telugu, Thai, Tigrinya, Tunisian, Turkish, Turkmen, Uighur, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Shanghainese, Yakan, Yemeni, Yoruba

Making flash cards: Launch app and choose "Flash cards" from the menu in the top corner, and follow the prompts.

title: Free WiFi Passwords & Internet Hotspots. WiFi Map¬Æ
description:
Connect to any WiFi for FREE! WiFi Map is the largest Wi-Fi community in the world!

The largest WiFi hotspot database in the world

WiFi Map¬Æ has more than 150 million WiFi hotspots available worldwide and the number is growing daily thanks to our community. With the app, you can connect to WiFi hotspots for free, get actual passwords, and make updates together with millions of WiFi Map users!

Fast and secure VPN for public WiFi networks

Use our built-in VPN for private internet access and to keep your connection secure. Use WiFi Map and the unlimited VPN to securely browse the internet, make and accept calls, text in messengers, and stay online with a single WiFi Map app. Also, you can get around some regional limitations and, for example, get access to your local services.

Detailed offline maps to find the internet everywhere

It‚Äôs always difficult to stay without an internet connection when you are traveling or simply out of carrier service. This is where the offline WiFi passwords map will help. Download the map of the whole region with the complete hotspots data to make sure you‚Äôre able to connect to the internet.

Benefit from a WiFi Map community and support it

Use a WiFi scanner to look for nearby Wi-Fi networks, speed test them, and connect to the fastest ones. At the same time, you‚Äôre contributing to the WiFi Map community by sharing hotspot data and performance details. Thanks to our users you will always get actual information on hotspots around.

Sneak peek of WiFi Map main features
- Find the internet all over the world
- Access internet for FREE when you connect to WiFi
- Millions of WiFi hotspots available worldwide
- Genuine WiFi passwords and useful tips
- Use map navigation to find the local hotspots
- Apply filters to find out the nearest WiFi around you
- Smart search on the WiFi map
- Add WiFi hotspots around you to the map
- Download offline maps when you travel
- Share WiFis on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter with your friends
- Unlimited secure VPN
- Multiple reliable VPN servers worldwide
 
How to get connected?
1. Open the WiFi Map app.
2. Find an available WiFi hotspot around you.
3. Connect to the WiFi hotspot using information in the app. 
4. Enjoy fast, FREE and reliable internet access!

FAQ: 
# How to add a new WiFi hotspot to WiFi Map: https://youtu.be/zNRa4TVxc18
 
=====================
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wifimap.io/
Website: https://www.wifimap.io/

recentChanges:

comments: App keeps crashing since I updated to Android 11 on Pixel 2XL. Developer responded to my original post very quickly to say they are aware of the issue and working on a fix. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to the next update, so I changed my review from 1 star to 3 stars for now. The crash message appears every few minutes which is beyond annoying. I didn't want to uninstall app for fear I'd forget to reinstall it, as I have a large number of apps on my phone, but I may have to.

This app has taken my monthly subscription pack and then neither connected my wifi with others and also show me 5 km far away wifi is situated . It is the worst app . They have not connected my my neighbour wifi . Please dont download it .

Usefull app for travel. It is a database where other users can add known wifi passwords from home networks, shops, caf√©s,... This means during travel it is no longer needed to go drink or eat somewhere just to get the wifi password. It looks like you need a premium account to open it, it is not the case. Just click unlock password, manage through the ads and find the wifi password. The ones that I have unlocked and used, were always working. Can't complain for a free app and free wifi ;) I'll take some ads with that.
The application is far good, though i'm not able to detect and access near by wifi.

Don't install this app........ Worst üëéüëé.... Because this a meaning less app....... When i installed this app i thought that i should be able to connect with local free wifi and this app show me the password of all wifi...... But reality is that for this feature you should buy premium membership........ Than what's meaning of app--"Free WiFi Passwords & Internet"

title: Google Primer
description: Primer is a free, fast and easy way to learn new business and digital marketing skills. Primer works offline too, so you can take a lesson on business planning, management, sales, digital advertising, social media, content marketing, SEO, analytics, branding, and more whenever you have 5 minutes free - anytime, anywhere. You get personalized next steps after each lesson, so you can put your new skills to work right away. Get the business and marketing knowledge you need quickly and easily, and keep track of your progress to make learning new skills part of your everyday life.
descriptionHTML: Primer is a free, fast and easy way to learn new business and digital marketing skills. Primer works offline too, so you can take a lesson on business planning, management, sales, digital advertising, social media, content marketing, SEO, analytics, branding, and more whenever you have 5 minutes free - anytime, anywhere. You get personalized next steps after each lesson, so you can put your new skills to work right away. Get the business and marketing knowledge you need quickly and easily, and keep track of your progress to make learning new skills part of your everyday life.
summary: Primer is a fast, easy way to learn new marketing skills. Made by Google.
developerAddress:
Google, Inc
1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy
Mountain View
CA 94043
USA
recentChanges:
Now you can use Primer's list of skills to stay on top of your goals.
‚Ä¢ Pick skills that match your goals and we'll show you the right lessons.
‚Ä¢ Track your progress and update your goals anytime by visiting your profile.
comments: First of all, great app. I have given a 5-star rating because I have not had any problems with the app. It is very user friendly, simple and the lessons are to the point. I like how it includes user interaction within the lessons. There's one feature that I would like to be included, dark mode. Great app and I hope this review helps.

Many thanks Google for this great app. Insightful and well explained contents. I like the fact that I can read without being connected to the internet. Although, I don't know if it's my device memory that is full but I noticed the app do freeze once in a while when flipping through the pages.

This app is an absolutely life saver and gem for businesses especially those who don't have a team and doing everything on their own - hence no time to expand in beneficial knowledge. But this app solves that problem. Absolutely love this.

The app is just way too handy for quick, refreshing ideas. It's for everyone. Small & big businesses, freshers & managers, almost anyone can benefit from the short snippet courses available in the app.
This app has been really informative. I've learnt a lot from it in lessons that really simple and interactive. I'd give it a ten star rating if it was possible.

title: Ramuan Alami Mengatasi Penyakit Parkinson
description:
Dalam dunia medis, ada banyak macam-macam penyakit saraf  dan salah satu penyakit saraf yang cukup menyita perhatian dunia adalah parkinson. Bagi kalian yang belum mengenal parkinson berikut penjelasannya: Parkinson adalah penyakit yang diakibatkan oleh kerusakan sel-sel saraf di bagian otak dan berdampak pada sistem pergerakan tubuh. Oleh karena itu, penderita parkinson akan merasa kesulitan untuk mengendalikan gerakan yang terjadi di salah satu bagian tubuhnya. Pada umumnya gejala parkinson yang dapat disaksikan adalah gemetar pada satu tangan.

Parkinson dan epilepsi sering dianggap sama oleh masyarakat awam karena adanya kemiripan gejala yang ditimbulkan oleh kedua penyakit tersebut. Padahal menurut ahli saraf, kedua penyakit sangatlah berbeda. Gejala yang muncul akibat parkinson itu biasanya terjadi pada bagian tangan atau kaki sedangan mekanisme terjadinya epilepsi adalah kejang-kejang pada seluruh bagian tubuh.

title: CLINICALS MADE EASY
description:
"Clinicals made easy" is an android mobile app designed for the purpose of facilitation and guidance of medical students, interns and post graduate doctors to face clinical exams successfully. A group of clinical experts in the field of cardiology, respirology, neurology and GI medicine get together and developed is app in including following components
Full guide of system based-examination
Cases based discussions
Special note in clinical medicine
Video and audio guide of lung sound and heart sounds      

This is the world's first mobile app containing lots of information for the purpose of clinical exams.
It contains full guide of system based-examination described in simple way from A to Z which are essential to pass final MBBS, AMC,PLAB,USMLE and MRCP or any clinical exam.
Nearly of fifteen real life exam cases from simple straightforward to  advance case discussions.
Questions asked in the exam and the answers.
It also have a set of special clinical notes including exam tips, diagrams to remember and the essential aspects in disease managements candidate must know. 

Clinical examinations are compulsory aspect in the curriculum of undergraduate and post graduated doctors. Each and every medical student should pass clinical examinations in order to qualify and practice as doctor. Apart from studying for theory exams clinical skill development is essential.  

In general medicine there are four fundamental system based examinations.
Cardiovascular system
Respiratory system
Abdominal system
Neurological system

In each and every system examination there is step wise manner to proceed and standardized methods to follow. Practice correct examination technique is  must to elicite signs. Even though the diagnosis correct but if the techniques are wrong you will be disqualified. Day today practice will improve your skills and the speed of detection of signs which are needed to successfully pass clinical exams.

title: Spanish (Colombia) Medical Phrases - Works offline
description:
Military-related phrases for language learners. With text and audio.

Using this app, you can select an English phrase and view its translation and how to pronounce it in the foreign language.

This app was originally developed as an entry to the 2010 CIO/G6 "Apps for the Army" competition, and it is based on the modules publicly available online from the U.S. Defense Language Institute. While this app's subject matter relates mainly to military topics, the app is broadly useful with content relating to a range of topics.

‚òÖ Easy to use
‚òÖ Native speaker audio
‚òÖ Dictionary lookup
‚òÖ Pronunciation help: Transliteration/Romanization text
‚òÖ Over 600 phrases
‚òÖ Voice-based lookup (speak the phrase you want in English)
‚òÖ Good for language learning, or as a reference
‚òÖ Free and unlimited

This is part of a series of phrasebook apps published for many different languages and dialects. Phrasebooks in the series are available as "basic" and "medical" variants.

‚òÖ Text may be exported as Anki flash cards
‚òÖ Works offline: No network connection is required
‚òÖ Search bar for quick vocabulary lookup
‚òÖ No login or registration needed
‚òÖ Dark background color minimizes eye strain

Many of the languages covered by this series of phrasebook apps are under-resourced, with translation apps and dictionaries not widely available from other sources.

*BASIC* phrasebooks contain the following categories of phrases:

Commands, Warnings and Instructions
Helpful Words, Phrases and Questions
Greetings and Introductions
Interrogation
Numbers
Days of the Week/Time
Directions
Locations
Descriptions (Colors, Shapes, Sizes, Tastes, Qualities, Quantities)
Emergency Terms
Food and Sanitation
Fuel and Maintenance
Medical Terms/General
Medical Terms/Parts of the Body
Military Ranks
Lodging
Occupations
Customs (Port of Entry)
Relatives
Weather
General Military Terms
Mine Warfare Terms

*MEDICAL* phrasebooks contain the following categories of phrases:

Introduction
Guidance
Registration
Assessment
Surgical Consent
Trauma
Procedures
Foley (Catheter)
Surgery Instructions
Pain Interview
Medicine Interview
Orthopedic
Obstetrics/Gynecology
Pediatrics
Cardiology
Ophthalmology
Neurology
Exam Commands
Caregiver
Post-Op/Prognosis
Medical Conditions
Pharmaceutical
Diseases

How to use

1. Choose a subject category from the menu. That category will be expanded.
2. From the expanded list of phrases shown, tap on the phrase you want.
3. On the phrase detail page, the phrase itself is shown alongside its pronunciation and the equivalent English phrase. Press the Play button to hear the audio pronunciation by a native speaker.

Ideal for

üåê U.S. Military service members
üåê Language learners
üåê Doctors, nurses, and medical staff
üåê Travelers
üåê Aid workers
üåê Linguists

Other languages and dialects available in this series

recentChanges:
- Minor bug fixes
- Enhanced user experience
- Improved system performance

Updates in v7.0:
- Entirely re-designed User Interface with enhanced offline search functionality
- Supported US & UK pronunciation with phonetics

- Wildcard characters search support

comments: Absolutely brilliant! I have tried a number of different free off-line dictionaries and this is the best I have found. I like the auto-fill in feature so that you do not have to type the whole word, but can choose from its suggestions. I particularly like the analyser feature where you can review what words you have looked up, so this is a further aid to learning new words. Not only is a translation for an English or Spanish word give, but there are examples of the word in context. Finally, the layout is particularly pleasant and easy to read.

Awesome. But could be perfect if categorize some words. Like "french words", "adjectives", "nouns", "verbs", "contractions", "internet words"... But offline that, obviously Anyway it's awesome! But there's no some words yet
This is an excellent opportunity for find and search many means, and improve your englis when you are a student.
Easy to use and I like that I can hear the pronunciations.
I'm happy. It is an excellent app to do queries and improve pronunciation.

title: Google Support Services
description:
The Google Support Services (GSS) app allows you to share your Android device screen with a Google customer support agent for a personalized support experience. With GSS on your device, the agent can invite you to share your screen, and guide you with on-screen annotations making it faster and easier to resolve your issue. While sharing your screen, the agent will not be able to control your device, but will be able see your screen to help explain their instructions. You can completely stop or pause sharing your screen at any time.
 
 This app comes pre-installed on Pixel devices, and Nexus devices with Android 7.1.1 or higher; it can be installed on most devices with Android 5.0 or higher. This app cannot be started by itself and is used only when a Google customer support agent sends an invite to the user to share their screen.

recentChanges:
- Share your screen with Google customer support on most devices with Android 5.0 and higher versions.

- Bug fixes.
comments: I am really grateful for Google services help. I stick when it comes to having a technological know how is irritating to me. This app has saved me and keeps me from crashing anymore computers, tablets especially I went through 41 mobile phones before this and now thanks to this Google services app I have had the same mobile phone for over a year and a half. Thank you Google.

Horrible!! App will not connect with representative..shuts down every time. Google reps don't care. I have multiple issues with my Google account..no support other than email. Impossible to explain and ridiculous that this app is available but won't work and not one rep even questions why or tries to figure it out? Its a new Samsung S20 plus..it should work on my phone. I feel as if I've wasted a lot of money on a Google based phone that I have no direct support for...unacceptable.

I see people on this app angry top. Had 5 month of hell with pixel 3a. The last week has been a replacement handset and now this one does not recongnise having a sim.. i feel sorry the peeps anwering the phones for google as they have have been hung out to dry. The one that called me the morning did not show as the usuall California number. It was his real name and location and phone number Got screenshots to prove it. Google can't even protect there own data lmao. Never mind us customers
I'm still having trouble with my pixel 3A receiving text and sending text nobody seems to have an answer not even Google support I guess it's a spiritual thing
Because after I installed the app it's say to uninstall and I call Google phone number and it sent me to this app and it's doesn't not work for me

title: Modern Warplanes: Sky fighters PvP Jet Warfare
description:
‚úàÔ∏èModern Warplanes transfers you to the world of modern supersonic jet fighters of leading air forces. Join millions of aces from around the world in ultimate warfare for air domination. Dogfight aeronautics at its finest on a huge variety of aircrafts.

Modern Warplanes: Thunder Aces PvP Warfare is absolutely FREE to download!üí•üí•üí•

Fight on all the best military aircrafts of modern generation, as well as airplane prototypes of leading air forces. The modern game presents a jet fighter shooter filled with lit action. Take-off from carrier to meet a squadron of special ops fighter airplanes in the sky, engage in team and solo action warfare. Our game features multiplayer PvP modes, solo campaign with different top gun missions, HQ raid, survival. A war thunder is roaring! Spread your steel wings commander and join the combat!

The game is one of the top action jet fighter shooter wargame of 2020!

‚úàÔ∏èStunning Graphics
- Magnificent graphics, as in PC action wargames: fully-featured 3d realistic models of steel jets and spectacular visual effects

‚úàÔ∏èOnline war
- Warfare against airplane aces from all around the world: US, UK, Germany, Russia, India, Indonesia, Brazil, Turkey, Pakistan and others

‚úàÔ∏èTons of aircrafts
- More than 30 types of air force planes: real-world warplanes and 3 prototypes of the 6th generation top gun fighters capable of almost spacecraft aerobatics (like x-wing or tie-fighter):
Falcon, Raptor, SU, Mig, Raven, Blackbird, Nighthawk, Boeing, JAS Gripen, Lockheed Blackbird and more

‚úàÔ∏èJet fighters
- Each plane with unique characteristics and capabilities has its own secondary top gun on wings

‚úàÔ∏èEquip your plane
- More than 40 top guns: rockets, missiles, machine guns, heat flares and even lasers. Equip your warplane and hurry into PvP combat!

‚úàÔ∏èUpgrade your airplane
- Improve your plane armor, wings, speed, damage, reload time and other features with epic upgrade system. Become the best dogfight pilot!

‚úàÔ∏èAce combats as you like
- Online & Offline dogfight game modes: Solo Campaign, HQ raid, Survival, Boss fight, sky war against enemies on the ground, in the water and in the sky

‚úàÔ∏èAmazing sky battlefields
- Stunning locations: mountains, hot deserts, ice wastelands filled with supersonic jets and thunder of missiles and steel bullets

‚úàÔ∏èDaily missions, achievements, non-stop action
- Shoot without limits, as the war game has no energy! Play daily to receive epic bonuses to expand and improve your hangar of planes. Many achievements with cool battle rewards

‚úàÔ∏èEasy controls
- Full control: you control the speed, steel wings, missiles, top guns, heat flares. Perform landings and take-off from carrier, become an epic top gun pilot!

‚úàÔ∏èPvP ranking
- Battle ranks: from a rookie dogfighter to a general of Air Force. Think strategically, equip the best weapon on wings: tactical atomic missiles, swarm missiles, guiding rockets and much more

‚úàÔ∏èCustomization
- Customize warplanes. More than 26 war camo suitable for any mode or sky map: snow, pixel or bright as explosion

‚úàÔ∏èWarfare with friends
- Non-stop steel thunder wargame: fight in deathmatch or team dogfight, go for solo operation or create your own game to ally and battle with ace friends! A great game if you like shooters and speed!

From the time of cold war and pearl harbor all nations improve their Air Forces: the best planes on any battlefield! Take control of fast and deadly aircraft to destroy enemies in a direct dogfight! Be like a special ops in a combat with rival thunder pilots!

Next-level aircraft game. Regular updates and new content in shooter sky combat PvP game of 2020.

Not sure what to play? Try ‚úàÔ∏èModern Warplanes: Thunder Aces Combat Wings Warfare

Want to ask about the wargame or find friends or allies?
Facebook: www.facebook.com/GDCompanyGames
Support: support@gdcgames.ru

New daily deals shop!
Leviathan autoplay is available!
comments: I'd give this game a 4/5 because it has extremely good graphics for a mobile game right now! The gameplay is awesome i'd just like to suggest some changes like- 1) Can it be made easier to collect fragments of missiles and Planes, instead of paying huge amount of money? 2) Earning gold should be made easier. 3) The keys to unlock special cases should be given whenever you play a great TDM with good amount of kills.

Amazing game. Probably the best simulator i've ever played. Congratulations to dev team. For those who are quick reactions it is really excellent. Graphics, discovering little by little the game and new features happening. 5 stars without any hesitations. I don't know if VR can be used as i play on android. If it does, we are teleported on 22th century for air fighter games.

comments: My package arrived in good condition. Open it to proceed with the installation process; a this point I found the instructions inside the top cover to be very sparce. took the card out of the cover and found another card with a QR code to scan for further instructions, a this point I had already started the cleaning process with my phone shut down so it wouldn't keep flashing on while I was wiping the screen. Trade-offs have their pluses /minuses I suppose. Not being my first rodeo all went well.
We have to scan a QR code every day when we report to work for contact tracing purposes. Works flawlessly every time. Has saved tons of time in getting my work day started. Keep up the great work!
It worked well the first couple years that I had it, but recently it has not loaded anything that it scans. It shows that it's loading, but then it gets stuck on a white screen.
I had my screen protector lighting low and picked up the QR code I needed to scan. I was shocked it came through clear and in a very timely manner.
easy to use, understand d and gets me to where I need to go, no problems so far. Been using this app for 2 years.

title: MAG Medical Abbreviations DE
description:
MAG Medical Abbreviations DE is a free and easy to use dictionary of most popular German medical abbreviations and terms. This comprehensive offline reference for commonly used medical acronyms gives you easy access to thousands of medical terms with their full meanings, optionally expanded by most reliable on-line resources (Wikipedia, acronym databases). We upgrade both abbreviations as well as their descriptions regularly, making sure they are most accurate and up-to date.

Our app lets you discover medical abbreviations and terms found in health records or medical documentation, medical prescriptions, descriptions of health conditions, treatments, diseases or surgeries. 

Discover full meaning of German medical abbreviations like:
Rx, HDL, LDL, GOT, GPT, Ig, IgA, IgG, HBV, HCV, EEG, EKG, MRI, NMR.

MAG Medical Abbreviations DE app not only brings you reliable and accurate search function that gives you quick access to descriptions of abbreviations found in our glossary, but it also lets you find matching abbreviations for a given description. Decide whether to display search results for both abbreviations and descriptions or narrow them to abbreviations only by switching the search option accordingly. The powerful search function implements your device‚Äôs latest voice recognition features and its language settings for user-friendly, localized interface (English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Russian and Polish).

It's intuitive interface and no need for internet connection or login makes it one of a kind. If you are however unable to find what you are looking for, you may choose to ask others users about it or add yourself missing abbreviations.

MAG Medical Abbreviations DE is a trusted guide of medical abbreviations and medical terms that can by useful for Doctors, MDs, Physicians, PAs, NPs, nurses, paramedics, chiropractors, medical school students, other healthcare professionals, those in clinical practice or anyone seeking medical knowledge.

MAG Medical Abbreviations DE ‚Äì our trusted and up-to-date comprehensive abbreviations glossary that can also be used as medical terms dictionary, includes entries on:

title: Batten Disease
description: Batten disease is a fatal of the nervous system that typically begins in childhood. Onset of symptoms is usually between 5 and 10 years of age. Often it is autosomal recessive. It is the most common form of a group of disorders called the neuronal ceroid lipofuscinoses (NCLs)

summary: Batten disease is fatal of the nervous system that typically begins childhood.

In first levels of airplane flight, you will be guided with very easy tutorial to take high speed to take off from run-way and your mission will be to achieve to get specified height. stay tuned for updates (every week)!

title: Cebuano Medical Phrases - Works offline
description:
Military-related phrases for language learners. With text and audio.

Using this app, you can select an English phrase and view its translation and how to pronounce it in the foreign language.

This app was originally developed as an entry to the 2010 CIO/G6 "Apps for the Army" competition, and it is based on the modules publicly available online from the U.S. Defense Language Institute. While this app's subject matter relates mainly to military topics, the app is broadly useful with content relating to a range of topics.

‚òÖ Easy to use
‚òÖ Native speaker audio
‚òÖ Dictionary lookup
‚òÖ Pronunciation help: Transliteration/Romanization text
‚òÖ Over 600 phrases
‚òÖ Voice-based lookup (speak the phrase you want in English)
‚òÖ Good for language learning, or as a reference
‚òÖ Free and unlimited

This is part of a series of phrasebook apps published for many different languages and dialects. Phrasebooks in the series are available as "basic" and "medical" variants.

‚òÖ Text may be exported as Anki flash cards
‚òÖ Works offline: No network connection is required
‚òÖ Search bar for quick vocabulary lookup
‚òÖ No login or registration needed
‚òÖ Dark background color minimizes eye strain

Many of the languages covered by this series of phrasebook apps are under-resourced, with translation apps and dictionaries not widely available from other sources.

*BASIC* phrasebooks contain the following categories of phrases:

Commands, Warnings and Instructions
Helpful Words, Phrases and Questions
Greetings and Introductions
Interrogation
Numbers
Days of the Week/Time
Directions
Locations
Descriptions (Colors, Shapes, Sizes, Tastes, Qualities, Quantities)
Emergency Terms
Food and Sanitation
Fuel and Maintenance
Medical Terms/General
Medical Terms/Parts of the Body
Military Ranks
Lodging
Occupations
Customs (Port of Entry)
Relatives
Weather
General Military Terms
Mine Warfare Terms

*MEDICAL* phrasebooks contain the following categories of phrases:

Introduction
Guidance
Registration
Assessment
Surgical Consent
Trauma
Procedures
Foley (Catheter)
Surgery Instructions
Pain Interview
Medicine Interview
Orthopedic
Obstetrics/Gynecology
Pediatrics
Cardiology
Ophthalmology
Neurology
Exam Commands
Caregiver
Post-Op/Prognosis
Medical Conditions
Pharmaceutical
Diseases

How to use

1. Choose a subject category from the menu. That category will be expanded.
2. From the expanded list of phrases shown, tap on the phrase you want.
3. On the phrase detail page, the phrase itself is shown alongside its pronunciation and the equivalent English phrase. Press the Play button to hear the audio pronunciation by a native speaker.

Ideal for

üåê U.S. Military service members
üåê Language learners
üåê Doctors, nurses, and medical staff
üåê Travelers
üåê Aid workers
üåê Linguists

Other languages and dialects available in this series

Albanian, Algerian, Amharic, Azeri, Baluchi, Bengali, Bosnian, Burmese, Cantonese, Cebuano, Chavacano, Croatian, Czech, Dari, Egyptian, Emirati, French, Gan (Jiangxinese), Georgian, Gujarati, Haitian, Hassaniya, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Igbo, Ilocano, Indonesian (Bahasa), Iraqi, Japanese, Javanese, Jordanian, Kashmiri, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean (North), Kosovar (Albanian), Kurmanji, Kyrgyz, Lebanese, Libyan, Lingala, Malay, Mandarin, Mongolian, Moroccan, Nepali, Palestinian, Pashto (Afgh.), Pashto (Pak.), Persian-Farsi, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Europe), Punjabi, Quechua, Russian, Saudi, Serbian, Sindhi, Somali, Sorani, Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Venezuela), Sudanese, Swahili, Syrian, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamashek, Tamil, Tausug, Telugu, Thai, Tigrinya, Tunisian, Turkish, Turkmen, Uighur, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Shanghainese, Yakan, Yemeni, Yoruba

Making flash cards: Launch app and choose "Flash cards" from the menu in the top corner, and follow the prompts.

title: Uzbek Medical Phrases - Works offline
description:
Military-related phrases for language learners. With text and audio.

Using this app, you can select an English phrase and view its translation and how to pronounce it in the foreign language.

This app was originally developed as an entry to the 2010 CIO/G6 "Apps for the Army" competition, and it is based on the modules publicly available online from the U.S. Defense Language Institute. While this app's subject matter relates mainly to military topics, the app is broadly useful with content relating to a range of topics.

‚òÖ Easy to use
‚òÖ Native speaker audio
‚òÖ Dictionary lookup
‚òÖ Pronunciation help: Transliteration/Romanization text
‚òÖ Over 600 phrases
‚òÖ Voice-based lookup (speak the phrase you want in English)
‚òÖ Good for language learning, or as a reference
‚òÖ Free and unlimited

This is part of a series of phrasebook apps published for many different languages and dialects. Phrasebooks in the series are available as "basic" and "medical" variants.

‚òÖ Text may be exported as Anki flash cards
‚òÖ Works offline: No network connection is required
‚òÖ Search bar for quick vocabulary lookup
‚òÖ No login or registration needed
‚òÖ Dark background color minimizes eye strain

Many of the languages covered by this series of phrasebook apps are under-resourced, with translation apps and dictionaries not widely available from other sources.

*BASIC* phrasebooks contain the following categories of phrases:

Commands, Warnings and Instructions
Helpful Words, Phrases and Questions
Greetings and Introductions
Interrogation
Numbers
Days of the Week/Time
Directions
Locations
Descriptions (Colors, Shapes, Sizes, Tastes, Qualities, Quantities)
Emergency Terms
Food and Sanitation
Fuel and Maintenance
Medical Terms/General
Medical Terms/Parts of the Body
Military Ranks
Lodging
Occupations
Customs (Port of Entry)
Relatives
Weather
General Military Terms
Mine Warfare Terms

*MEDICAL* phrasebooks contain the following categories of phrases:

Introduction
Guidance
Registration
Assessment
Surgical Consent
Trauma
Procedures
Foley (Catheter)
Surgery Instructions
Pain Interview
Medicine Interview
Orthopedic
Obstetrics/Gynecology
Pediatrics
Cardiology
Ophthalmology
Neurology
Exam Commands
Caregiver
Post-Op/Prognosis
Medical Conditions
Pharmaceutical
Diseases

How to use

1. Choose a subject category from the menu. That category will be expanded.
2. From the expanded list of phrases shown, tap on the phrase you want.
3. On the phrase detail page, the phrase itself is shown alongside its pronunciation and the equivalent English phrase. Press the Play button to hear the audio pronunciation by a native speaker.

Ideal for

üåê U.S. Military service members
üåê Language learners
üåê Doctors, nurses, and medical staff
üåê Travelers
üåê Aid workers
üåê Linguists

Other languages and dialects available in this series

Albanian, Algerian, Amharic, Azeri, Baluchi, Bengali, Bosnian, Burmese, Cantonese, Cebuano, Chavacano, Croatian, Czech, Dari, Egyptian, Emirati, French, Gan (Jiangxinese), Georgian, Gujarati, Haitian, Hassaniya, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Igbo, Ilocano, Indonesian (Bahasa), Iraqi, Japanese, Javanese, Jordanian, Kashmiri, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean (North), Kosovar (Albanian), Kurmanji, Kyrgyz, Lebanese, Libyan, Lingala, Malay, Mandarin, Mongolian, Moroccan, Nepali, Palestinian, Pashto (Afgh.), Pashto (Pak.), Persian-Farsi, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Europe), Punjabi, Quechua, Russian, Saudi, Serbian, Sindhi, Somali, Sorani, Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Venezuela), Sudanese, Swahili, Syrian, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamashek, Tamil, Tausug, Telugu, Thai, Tigrinya, Tunisian, Turkish, Turkmen, Uighur, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Shanghainese, Yakan, Yemeni, Yoruba

recentChanges:
All new words are waiting for you to draw them!
Add in a few special updates and there‚Äôs never been a better time to Draw Something.
So, update now!
comments: I love the game, but hate the ads. I'd gladly pay to get rid of ads, but I won't randomly throw my Facebook friends under the bus, and that's the only way to get rid of ads - temporarily even. You can leave the option to watch ads to get extra coins or bombs, but let us pay to avoid the pushed ads! Game glitches and splits the drawing in half and doubles it. When trying to play a new player, 80% resign immediately.

30 second ads that you can't skip after EVERY turn is ridiculous. I played it years ago and picked it up again a few days ago. It was much more fun then. Now it's gone way downhill. The word bank is limited, you can't delete games if the other player doesn't take their turn, and it's full of bugs and crashes constantly. Unfortunately, I'll be deleting.

Ads are more intrusive and frequent than any other app. Game is fine, little outdated, but the ads are off-putting, and designed to make you "accidentally" click them often. It makes me not want to log in, knowing that over half of my time will be spent waiting for 30 second videos to end. Suggestions: 1) Less ads: offer a way to earn coins to PERMANENTLY remove them. 2) Make it easier to choose colour pallets. 3) Men instantly quit when playing with other men, which is slimy and embarrassing.

they've added a feature where you can run out of ink I have a galaxy note, meaning I have a fairly large screen and a touch pen, so I want to use this game to make elaborate drawings for my friends. For years I'd randomly pick up this game on occasion and always had fun until this time when I ran out of ink and had to send a masterpiece drawing incomplete.

Ads are never fun and this game seems child oriented. The problem is some of the ads may contain some mature target audience content. Good app though. Someone might be crass and draw something inappropriate and the recipient might not be very old which could be bad. Should be an age filter so adults can play with adults and children can play with children. I had some adult words (toyota? Kids not going to know that) and I was playing with my nephews (6 and 9).

comments: This app works great. But after each update it gets messed up for a short while. The last time you gutpys updated two of my cameras stopped working on the app. but after two weeks or so they started working again. But now after the update on the 16th two of my cameras stopped working again. What's going on?

Poor experience in fast forward condition first you need to buy package than you can allow to use fast forward and that also not that great which you paid for cloud package Please put fast forward specifications in SD card also because without this specification no use to find person as soon as possible..... Otherwise this app and product (camera) is to easy to use

Im using network segment15(255.254.0.0) instead of 24,thats why even if we were in the same network with the same gateway, theres always a connecting issue. It would be better if this supports LAN storage as it is more secured and lower cost....I hope theres an update with facial recognition or maybe an update with 3D camera. Unstable playing over LAN when connected to wifi. Do you have a cam version with ethernet port capability? I think it would be better when playing livestream and replay....

This camera works well. Very good clear picture, and has different ways the camera will connect. Alarm and voice works well. In the settings you can turn off voice, and disarm alarm, which are nice features. 4 stars because it needs an option for split screen view, at the top on right side by the X like most apps maybe in the future though . So far this is a good security camera with lighting as well.

Application will not start at all after the update. Only white screen EDIT: I managed to start application by completely removing it and installing it again. Then I got notified to update camera firmware. I did. Camera said that update was finished and it seams that everything went fine (internet and power were stable). Now I cannot connect to camera at all. In application it says "connecting" forever on the panel where video should be shown.
